243b7(mdo): btsun pa dang na tod pasu@la pa dang ldan ni banas
244a1(mdo): ridags kyi nags na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
244a2(mdo): sa snyed rgyas kyi grong byer sdeb gang bde sbyin grol na byom mal bdag ga me de la 'jim sa/ dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir/ nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyams
244b1(mdo): dan lu na ma / sa pa/ mas du mangs su sal 'ad bka' sa la da / 
246a1(mdo): mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge' slong gi dge' 'dun la skya zas su mchis lags kyis/ bdag cag dgel snyen du gzung drug so lang // de bsran/ 
246a2(mdo): cad ci srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi' bar mngon par dang lags so// de nas dU sde bzang po yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yI nAs bcom
246a3(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas/ snga gron mtha' sham thabs mnams nas ldus gzed dang / chos
246a4(mdo): gos snams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la bzhud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod nams la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der thog mar su la chos bshad
246a5(mdo): snyam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ras klong pa'i bu mo dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes/ 
246a6(mdo): su gnas pa na 'dis mar sar dang / 'o thug sbrang rtsi lngar mngar ba sa bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa 'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma shrI khyim gangan pa der gshegs so// 
246a7(mdo): grogs bu so na rlob pa'i gshegs so// grong pa'i bu dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du bdas
246a8(mdo): bshams nas 'di skad ces kla sol to// bcom ldan 'das chur gyon bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol/ zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das ba dan bshams
246b1(mdo): ba de nyid la bzhugs so// de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dka' stobs mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go pos phyag nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
246b2(mdo): kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dka' stobs ma la chos bshad pa'i rnam gyis yang dag par bstand ces bya ba nas mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas grong pa'i bu mo
246b3(mdo): dga' mo dang nga/ dga' snyoms mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// btsun pa de 'i slang du 'dir zhal zas kyis mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga'
246b4(mdo): stobs ma la car gyi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas grong pa'i bu mo// dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang myi gsung bar ka nang nas par rig cing / bcom ldan 'das bde' bar bzhugs par
246b5(mdo): rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag ragyi lag nas bstobs shing tshim par byed de// rnam grangs dus na sa gtsang zhing / bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rab kyi
246b6(mdo): lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zind te/ phyag bcabs shing ldum zed gyu bar rig nas stand ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyand pa'i phyir
246b7(mdo): 'khod do// rengs bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' spobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i rnam gyis yang dag par bstan da/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par g.yeng stod
246b8(mdo): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas ba dan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas yul ma ga ta 'dir ngang tshul bzang
247a1(mdo): bor bkur ba'i dge' sbyong ngam/ za ze gang zhig dbang du byas na/ de dbang du gyur pas tshigs chu ngus skye bo mang po'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo// de'i tshe/ 
247a2(mdo): 'a lteng rgyas 'od srungs rasang pa can bcas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pas rgas 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de la ka da'i khyi rnams kyis bkur ste byas pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang
247a3(mdo): mchod par bya ba dang dgra' bcom par bkur cing / 'khor lnga brgya' dang ne ngan 'ja' da'i chu klung kyi 'gram gyi sti gnas na dka' thub myod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lteng
247a4(mdo): rgyas 'od srungs ra lad pa can btsas pa nas/ lo brgya'i nyi shu lon pa/ rgas pa 'khogs pa gtugs pa 'di ma ga ta'i myi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas/ dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du
247a5(mdo): ste/ ma langs lteng rgyas 'od srungs rald pa can dbang du byas te/ 'di dbang du gyur pa na tshegs chungs skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas
247a6(mdo): 'od srungs ral pa can gyi sti gnas gang na ba der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srubaral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi cheng du bdan bshes nas/ 'di
247a7(mdo): skad ces kyang gsolang to// dge' sbyong chen po byind pa legs so// dge' skyong chen po yud ring po zhig lags da ka nas 'khor te 'dir byond/ dge' sbyong chen po pa rang bshams pa nyid la
247a8(mdo): bzhugs shig ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang / bcom ldan 'das lhan cig tu mngon tu yang dag par dga'
247b1(mdo): par 'gyur ba dang / 'gu' bar gyud pa 'i ta rnam pa sna tshogs mdza nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungangs bcan
247b2(mdo): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'o// 'od srung gal te khyod la gyi ba de' ba myed na/ khyod kyi'i khang du bzhag/ dge 'dug go/ dge' sbyong chen po bdag la myi bdel ba la mchis na// 'ond kyang red ku gdug
247b3(mdo): pa can zhig gnas te/ des khyod la mtho' rtsams par 'gyur du mchi'o// 'od srung khyod kyis re shig gnang bar gyis dang 'azol 'tsham par myi 'gyur ro// dge' sbyong chen po gal te khyod la 'thol
247b4(mdo): myi 'tsham na dge' spyod chen po ci bde' bar bzhugs shika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byond nas/ me khang kyi phyi rol
247b5(mdo): tu zhabs bsil nas/ me khang gi nang du bzhugs te/ nyid/ kyis rtsa'i gding ba bshams nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste/ skyil mo krung bcas dran pa mngod pung phyogs par gzhag ste/ 
247b6(mdo): bzhugs so// klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'khros pa'i mthus dud pa byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus drud pa phyung ngo // klu gdug pas
247b7(mdo): 'khro ba'i mthus 'bar bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas klu gdug pa 'khros pa'i mthu' dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ me Shang
247b8(mdo): du thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar / kund tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg byar byed do// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu
248a1(mdo): 'bar ku nad tu rab tu 'bar ro// me khang gcig tu gyur nas sreg par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge' spyod chen po koSh+ya ta ma 'di ltar mdzes pa/ klu gdug pas/ 
248a2(mdo): thal bar byas par ma gyur da grang kyi hud nyon mongs bdag gi tshig ma mnyam to snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas chos
248a3(mdo): bshad kyis sa langs rdzu 'phrul ji lta bur mdzod par 'du bya ba la/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa na/ mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la des kyang / de'i lus la gnod par gyi byed par byas
248a4(mdo): nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'dangs kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa thugs su mnya
248a5(mdo): par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zild kyis man nad nas de/ sa kyang de'i lus la gnod pa myi byed pa de lta bu mngon par mdzad de de dul bar mkhyend nas lhung gzed du bcug ste/ lte nga rgyas
248a6(mdo): 'od srung gang ba der bsdus te gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas yong to// dgel
248a7(mdo): spyod chen po gsod pa lta zhig/ 'od srung gson no// dge' sbyong chen po khyod kyi ltung zed de sdoms te/ byod pa ci/ 'od srung klu gdug pa gang gis mthus khyod kyi me khang du klu rad pa rdzu 'phru
248a8(mdo): dang myi ldan pa gnas su myi ster ba de/ ngas btul nas lhung bseg tu bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge' sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul
248b1(mdo): zhing mthules pa yin te/ ya mtshan che med kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das snyeng rgyas 'od srung ngas bcan gyi ste gnas cha bci bar bzhugs so// de'i tshe steng rgyas
248b2(mdo): 'od srung ral pa can go ste bstang gnas na/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i me'i zab gsum gsum ste/ me thab stong lnga brgyal yod do// de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams
248b3(mdo): la yongs su myong bar 'dod na/ me sbar bar ma nus so// de nas bre ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can ka na pa der song ste phyi nad nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa cad la 'di
248b4(mdo): skad ces smras so// 'khan po de mkhyend par mdzod cig// 'di ra bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad par 'tshal na zhugs te spar bar rngom thog lags te/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
248b5(mdo): can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge' spyod chen po bdag gi nye 'khor da ke nas na de'i mthul zhig ma byung gra snyam mo// dan pa sa 'od srung ra pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste/ phyi nang nas
248b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge' sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzod cig/ 'dor bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyal tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/ me de sbar bar rngo ma thog nas
248b7(mdo): bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dgel sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu' zhig ma byung grang ste bgyid de// 'od srung me de sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge' skyong chen po spar du gsol/ 
248b8(mdo): de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthul dang / lha nas kyi lha'i mthus me dor nga nyid 'bar bar gyu rang to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral bcan 'di snyam du sos te/ 'di ltar dge' skyob
249a1(mdo): chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba yin te// ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod nas me gsod par/ 
249a2(mdo): 'dod pa na gsad par mnus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gapad pa der dong ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral bcad la 'di skad ces smos so/ 'khar
249a3(mdo): po mkhyend par mdzod cig/ 'di bdag cag zhugs la yongs su zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgu pa'i jo la thog lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral bcan 'di snyam tu dgongs te/ 
249a4(mdo): dge' sbyong chen po bdag gi nyid 'khor na gnas nas/ de'i mthul zhig ma byung grang snyam mo de nas lte ba rgyas 'od srung ral pacan bcom ldan 'das gapan pa dang song ste phyinang nas
249a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas lan to// dge'achen pa la khyen dpa pa medzad cugams// 'dir bangan sh-i ze'i gyi zhu rnams thugs la yongs su san das zhugs dgras
249a6(mdo): 'tshal na ts+tsha pa'i ngos log lags// bdag 'di snyam tu sems te/ bdag gi nyan 'kho bar dge' sbyong chen po bcugs de'i mthul zhig mthung grang snyam mi bgyid do// 'od srung gyi de bsang ngas / da
249a7(mdo): spyong chen po 'gum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthul dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid ni'o// de nas ldeng rgyas 'od srung ral pacan 'di snyam du sos te/ 'di ltar
249a8(mdo): dge' sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba yin te/ ya mtshan me mod kyi bdag kyang dgral bcom pa yin do snyam mo// de nas dus gzhan zhikar lteng rgyas 'od srung la 'acar rang nyid me la
249b1(mdo): yongs su spyod par 'dod na spang ma nus so// zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang dkal bcom pa'i yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas gsad par 'dod nas
249b2(mdo): zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun su rab tu 'a
249b3(mdo): te me lce gcig tu gyur pa nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa cad 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bsad par ma nus so// 
249b4(mdo): de nas lteng rgyang 'od srung ngas bcar 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngag gi nyen 'khor na dge' sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthus zhig dbyung bar mgyurang grang snyam lo// de nas lter rgyas 'od sru ral pa
249b5(mdo): can bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der song ste phyining nas bcom lnga na 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ge rgya nam byed pa ya sas da nam rgyam dag ga sa ma thamamasas/ 'bar rab tu 'bar ku nang tu rab tu
249b6(mdo): 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyu rad nas sreg par 'byed pa de la bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshigs chen pos bsgribs nas/ zhu dkum pa'i'ajom thog nas/ bdag 'di snyam
249b7(mdo): du sems te/ bdag gi nyid 'khor dge' sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthul zhig zung bar ma gyur dgrang snyam bgyid do// 'od srung me dezhi par byal/ dge' sbyong chen po zhi bar yadza drug mas
249b8(mdo): de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyisas rgyab kyi sang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthul me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral po can 'di snyam du ses te/ 'di ltar dgel sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu'/ 
250a1(mdo): che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no// snyam mo de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sti gnas/ rags tsha ching na bzhugs so// de nas
250a2(mdo): rgyam ze chen po bzhi 'kho dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo langs par bcom ldan 'das ga pad pa der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag byas te/ de nas dper na
250a3(mdo): me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kund tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyurd nas sreg par byed pa bzhi'i mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge' spyong chen po yang me la yongs su
250a4(mdo): kyang // 'di ltang de'i gyan ldan pa'i phung po 'ab ra kun tu rab tu 'bang / me sreg cig tu byu nas zed/ dar byed pa med dogam mo// de das snyed rgyas 'od srung ngas pas
250a5(mdo): ldan 'das gan pa dang sngon kyi / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dka' skyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag ma dang gsum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ dge' spyong
250a6(mdo): chen po'i spyad snganas zhugs kyi phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar// kun tu rab tu 'bad te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas med par byed pa bzhi'i mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge'
250a7(mdo): spyod chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de// 'di ltar de'i spyan snga nas me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ ku nad tu rab tu 'bar te// me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi'i mthong zhing mchis so snyam mo// 
250a8(mdo): 'od srung ming me la yongs su myod de/ nga me la yongs su myi spyod de// mkhas pa kun nas nyon mongs las// sems ni yongs su zlogs byed kyi// me'i yang na chu dag la// yongs sde dang yon tan mi zhig/ 
250b1(mdo): yod// de lta mod kyi 'dir ma dang gsum rgyal po chen po bzhi' po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na ra gangan pa deng 'ongs te lhags nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas te/ 
250b2(mdo): rnams dper ra me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kund tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi' bo lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas
250b3(mdo): 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam sems te/ 'di ltar dge' spyod che chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthul che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyis dbang po
250b4(mdo): brgya' byin kha dog 'phags pa'i sa mtshan mo la bab pa na/ btsom ldan 'das kang na ba der song ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i
250b5(mdo): phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kund tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi' po de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing / ches 'phags pa ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig
250b6(mdo): tu 'dug go// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar nas la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan/ me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge la sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing / 
250b7(mdo): mthu' che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar bya/ gong ma bzhin no// de nas myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas/ mtshan ma
250b8(mdo): ma thab pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der mang ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la/ 'go thos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du theg
251a1(mdo): pa byas bya ba nas/ me'i phung po lnga po de dag me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la/ tshes bzang ba lta bu/ 
251a2(mdo): 'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnaMs la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas
251a3(mdo): dge' sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no// snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi
251a4(mdo): 'dug gnas ra mchod sbyin zhag bdud pa la byed pa la bab bo// drenas steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ la te ba ka ta'i byirnams kyis dge' sbyong cher po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
251a5(mdo): che zhing mthu 'che ba yin par shes na de nyid lta bya ba byed par sems kyi// bdag la na de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyis/ kye ma dge 'a spyod chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan tu song yang tsam
251a6(mdo): bcung gam mo/ gde nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lcang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdud gzhan du bzhud do// de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ras ba can la rnyed pa dang
251a7(mdo): bkul stiyin 'a byed 'thung ngo // bza' ba dang bca' bslang podang ldad la skye bo'i chogs chen po dang ldad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du byur du// de nas gebaltas 'ang srung ngas pacas
251a8(mdo): 'dug gnas da/ mthong spyod nag brgyan du byam nad pa dang / 'di snyam numams te/ zhag bdun po 'di la bdag rnyed pa dang / bkrur bu chen po byung nas bza' 'a dang/ bal ba rab tu ma pa
251b1(mdo): dang ldan pa skye bo tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur da kyis// kye ma da ni dge' sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci mchung snyam du bdag gis de yang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo// dre nas bcom/ ldan
251b2(mdo): 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyend nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ngal pa can ka na pa der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgya ba pa po nas mdze // 
251b3(mdo): mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge' sbyong chen po byo nod do// 'od srung 'ongs so// dge' sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad tu zhag bdun 'di 'das nas gzhan du bzhud lags
251b4(mdo): 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab pa nas/ 'di snyam du gal te/ ma ga ta'i myi rnams kyi/ dge' sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul mthu' che ba yin no// 
251b5(mdo): bar zhes na/ de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag ni de lta mayin pa'i 'di yod par 'gyur gyis/ kye ma dgel spyod chen/ bo zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang tsam rung
251b6(mdo): bya sems pa ma yin na/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyisas zhes nas/ zhag bdun 'das nas gzhan du song ngo // 'od pa'i slad du 'dir byed lags// 'od srung khyod kyi sbyin zhag bdun du bram zi dang da/ 'a
251b7(mdo): snyam du bdag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur lci byung na chen po byung zhing ba'al ba dang / bca' bar gtum po dang yang ldang skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dab cur dkyis kye ma dgel sbyong chen po 'a
251b8(mdo): kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la yongs su long byad tu gzhug go// snyam du sems pa ma yin na/ dge' sbyong chen po de lta lags so// pa'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas pa 'ongs pa yin no// 
252a1(mdo): dge' skyong chen po co bde la kho dar longs spyod du gsol// de nas ke blteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyi 'di snyam du sems te// 'di ltar dge' sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba yid
252a2(mdo): te/ ya mtshan che yod kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od sru par la bcan kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge' sbyong chen po de'i srad cu bdag nyid
252a3(mdo): kyi nyen 'khor du bzhugs shig dang / bdag kyis khyod la chos dang 'thun pa'i 'cho' ba sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ngal pa can la cang kyi gsung ba gnang ngo // de nas lteng rgyas 'od
252a4(mdo): srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas// bcom ldan 'das ga ngan pa dang song ste phyi nad nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge' sbyong
252a5(mdo): chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge' spyod/ chen po de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// 'od srung de'i phyir song shi ga yang yod ngo do// de nas bcom ldan
252a6(mdo): 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas/ ring po ma lon par mkhyend nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag nas shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba kang gis 'dzam bu gling du kadags
252a7(mdo): pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang ro dang ldan zhing 'jam bu'i stim nas kyis lhung gzed bkang nas snams te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi ste gnas ka pad pa der gshegs te/ de lta bu'i
252a8(mdo): ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs te byond nas bdan bshams pa nyid la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das ste gnas kyi
252b1(mdo): khadar bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge' sbyong chen po byond ta/ 'od srung 'ongs so// dge 'a sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung gzed datsamatsham
252b2(mdo): 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas/ ring po ma lon par mkhyen das ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba kar gyis 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa/ da las kha dog dang / 
252b3(mdo): dri dang/ ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snyem nas kyis lham gzed bkang nas 'dir phyind pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs kyi gal te 'dod na long spyod cing // dge' spyod chen po che bde' ba
252b4(mdo): kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di ste du sems te/ 'di ltar dge' spyod chen po rgyu 'phrul che zhing mthul che ba yin na/ ya mtshan ce mod kyi bdag
252b5(mdo): kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo// shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis// 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa de dang / cang mya ring ba zhig na/ a nu pa'i nags dang / bil ba
252b6(mdo): nags dang / ka pi ta'i nags dang / sku ra 'i nags kyang de bzhin du'o// byang gyi sgra myi stan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma mos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras lhung gzed bkang ste/ snams nas
252b7(mdo): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sti gnas gangan pa der gshegs te byon nas bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lte rgyas
252b8(mdo): 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sti gnas kyi// bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol ngo to// dge' sbyong chen po byo nad do// 
253a1(mdo): 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge' sbyong chen po khyod kyi lung med na ci mchis// 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma 'anod par mkhyen das/ ji lur thugs mnyam par bas/ 
253a2(mdo): nabyang gi sgra myi snyan kyi sring du gshegs nas/ ma chos pa'i ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras bus lhung gzed bka das/ 'dir byinang pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzid la snyoms par bzhugs
253a3(mdo): kyis/ gal te 'dod na long spyod cig/ dge' sbyong chen po che bdel bar kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dko' spyod chen po rtswa
253a4(mdo): 'phrul che/ zhing mthu' che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che dad kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo// denas bdam ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod smos
253a5(mdo): bzhes nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zha zas kyi bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgyal byin
253a6(mdo): kyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgas pa byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste/ khyend nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la srun pa dang / de nas bkod
253a7(mdo): pa chen po zhig byung ste/ chu 'bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i dgos pa mdzad do// steng rgyas 'od sru ral pa can stig nas na 'chag par bkod pa byung ste/ chu 'bab pa mthong ngo // 
253a8(mdo): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon no myed na chu'i 'dir ltar kang nas bab snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang ra ba der song ste/ byin da
253b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// dge' sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsol// bdag 'ding ba sti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod pa chen po 'chi ba gci/ ma ma thong / brtson
253b2(mdo): nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'ang sngon ni ma mchis da/ da lta cu 'jig brnas pab sum bgying // 'od srung khrod 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms pa zhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te/ 
253b3(mdo): zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa ya nga chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya' byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ ngaka par ba der 'ongs te phyi nad pa dang / 
253b4(mdo): pa'i bdun du lag pas sa klu dad pa las// de nas bkod pa chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chu'as chu'i dgos pa mdzad de/ 'od srung rje 'dini lag pas nos pa zhes bya'o// de nas la
253b5(mdo): rgyas 'ang srung ngas bcad 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di sa dge' sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'thu'i che ba yin te/ mtshan ma med kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mi
253b6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phred yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas gos pa gangan pa der gshegs te byod nas/ rdzing lag pas bgos pa'i 'gra kyi mtha' gcig tu zlaba'/ 
253b7(mdo): ma gos rnams bzhag ste/ rnying lag pas nos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzadad/ rdzing lag pas nos pa nas byung bar bzhed das thung bar bzhed par/ dpas rdzun ka pan pa de lag/ 
253b8(mdo): cag rgyapa sa// da gi rgyan las gnyen bdud par gyu te// des 'das kyis parnams/ rdzi lag pas nas sa blang ngo // gleng rgyas 'ad srung mi tshad gyiganas na/ 
254a1(mdo): 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na/ ma dz+nyA na'i yal ka chen po dud pa zhig mthong // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sos te/ ardzuna'i yal ka 'di sngon
254a2(mdo): ni dud par ma gur na/ a b+hu na'i yal ga chen po 'di su zhig gis dud snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyind nas// bcom ldan 'das
254a3(mdo): la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge' spyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsolang // bdag 'dir ste gnas na 'chag pa na/ rdzing lag/ pas rgos pa'i 'gran mardzuna'i yal ga chen po dud pa mdzod
254a4(mdo): mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ ar+g+ha na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon 'dud par ma gyur dan/ da su zhig gis btung snyam bgyid do// 'od srung phyi 'breng nang du yang dag 'jon
254a5(mdo): khas bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas rkos pa ke pad bdenagashegs te byod dag/ rdzing lag pas gos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu bla za' chos gos rnams bzhag ce/ 
254a6(mdo): rdzib lag pas gos par zhugs te/ lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzun 'di dag gang na ba der logs su lag brkyang ba dang / de nas a rdzu na'i yal ga chen
254a7(mdo): po 'di rud par gyur te// de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag pas gos pa nas byung ngo // 'od srung 'di ni ma gyu na'i lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems
254a8(mdo): te// 'di dge la spyod chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba yin gyi// ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod du sha na'i ras dag
254b1(mdo): brnyes nas de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du dkyul stsa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyal byid kyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das
254b2(mdo): kyis dgongs pa shes nas/ ri brag gcig las rdo leb ga la ring ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der song ste phyind nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
254b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la phyag dar khrod pa sha no'i ras ngag 'di la bkru' bar gsol// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i shan 'i ras rnams bkrus sogan sa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ pa'i
254b4(mdo): phyag dar khrod pa'i dus rnams gang du bkra snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya la byed kyi sems kyis/ bcom/ ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las jol
254b5(mdo): che la ring ba zhig khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas lang to// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i sha ma'i
254b6(mdo): ras rnams bkra du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can sti gnas na 'chag pa na/ rdo le ba che la ring ba dag mthong ngo
254b7(mdo): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du mos te/ rdol ba che ba la ring ba 'di dag su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de/ bcom ldan 'das ga na pa der song
254b8(mdo): ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// dge' sbyong chen po mkhyend par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag sti gnas da 'chag pa da rdo leb che lo reb dag gcig
255a1(mdo): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rdo le 'che ba la ri ba 'di dag sngon na ye ma mchis da/ rdo la ba chel ri ba 'di dag su zhig gis 'chal te mchis snyam cu
255a2(mdo): bgyid do// 'od srung 'dasengs phyag dang khrod pa'ig na'i ras dag brnyes so// de nas nga 'di snyam du sems ste/ phyag dang khrod pa 'di sha 'dis dag gang du dkru' snyam pa dang / de nas lhanams
255a3(mdo): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas thag gcig la dole ba ches ring ba zhig zungs te/ dag ngan pa deng 'ongs te phyin nas ngas 'di gang kyis gapo' s+ho// chos ldan
255a4(mdo): 'di la phyag dang khrod pa'i dag 'dis de rnams bkru ba gsol/ dngas phyag dang khrod pa'i gan lings rnams dkyus so/ paSh+Ti sum tshu mams ras phyag dang khrod pa'i gna'i sa
255a5(mdo): kang du badz+ra snyam pa dang / gnas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/ zan rje/ ga las rdo le ba chel ring ba zhig grangs te/ ngagapad brje
255a6(mdo): 'ongs te phyinang nas ngal 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i shan le ras rnams dgra du gsol// ngas de la phyag dang khrod pa'i gna'i ngas dgra mo 'od srung rdo les
255a7(mdo): che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin kyis blangs pa zhes bya'o// de nas lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te// 'di ltar dge' spyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthul che ba yin te// ya mtshar
255a8(mdo): che mod kyi bdag kyang dkra' bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcoM ldan 'as lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sti gnas nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ de'i tshe ne ran 'dza' ma'i chu rang thug nas khab po/ 
255b1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung myi gang bas lhag par khyebs pa'i steng na rdul gyis g.yog pa pra ga ba myed pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do// de nas lte nga rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
255b2(mdo): 'di snyam du sems te dge' sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po thug pas khyer bar ma gyur da grang ma la bdag gis dge' sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams nas shing gcig pa'i gru 'inang du
255b3(mdo): zhugs te bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pacad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das chu klung kyi gang pas lhag par khyebs pa'i steng na sa rdul gyis yog pa bla gab myed na 'chag pas 'chag
255b4(mdo): ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadas gsol to// dgel sbyong chen po gsod nas/ 'odadang gson no// dge' sbyong chen po zhugs shing / gcig
255b5(mdo): 'idrur 'jug kam/ 'od srung 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar thugs ma nyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i glu ji ltar tshul 'jug pa
255b6(mdo): de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i klu ji lta bur tshul 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
255b7(mdo): mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pacar 'di ste du sems te 'di ltar dge' sbyong chen po rgya 'phrul che zhing mthul che ba yin do// ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dasngal bcom pa
255b8(mdo): yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyam 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lce brgyas 'od sru ngaral pa cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// 'od srung khyod na
256a1(mdo): dgra' bcom pa ma yin no// dgra' bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra' bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de ya myi shes so// de nas lteng
256a2(mdo): rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge' sbyong chen po ko& ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// dge la skyes
256a3(mdo): chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / sked pa rdzogs pa dge 'aslong gi dngos po / 'thob pa ltan dge' sbyong chen po'i rkyen spar bdag cag tshangs par phyin
256a4(mdo): pa spyad par 'bagyi'o// 'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la ltas dga' spyod chen po ma lhas lags so// 'od srung de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la/ ltos shig/ 'dir khyod lta bu'i myi glegs pa
256a5(mdo): dang ldan pa shes gnyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba lagapa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od sru pa ral pa can rang gyi/ sti gnas ka na pa der song ste phyinang nas/ bram ze'i lce
256a6(mdo): shu nas la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag kho lo ni dge' slo chen po'i spyan snga mtshangs par myod ba kyangs/ shes ldan dag ci byed mkhan po bdag cag gis chung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad
256a7(mdo): ni mkhan po la rtend nas lags pas/ gal te dge' sbyong chen po'i pyan snga mtshangs par myong pa myang ba na/ bdag tsug kyang 'khan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze'i khye
256a8(mdo): dag khyod kyis de'i phyir/ g.yang bzhi'i dang shi shud dang / 'khang pa dang / ril ba s+ye 'u lugs dang thugs gzhang rnams chu klung der na 'dzal na'i 'gram du bong bcag/ 'khan po
256b1(mdo): bkra' bzhin 'chas zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang bzhi'i dang / shi kun dang / khar pa dang / ris bya ste lugs dang / krugs gas rnams chu klu de ngan 'ad la da'i 'dra
256b2(mdo): du bong nas// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa cad gapan pa de song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srupa sa bcad la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po 'di bdag cag kyis bkye' bgang lan sa/ 
256b3(mdo): pa de bgyis lags so// de nas lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya' dang / bcom ldan 'das ka ngan pa der song ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
256b4(mdo): dge' sbyor chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu bya/ pa 'a dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i dge' slo gi dngos po/ 
256b5(mdo): 'thob pa lta na/ bdag dge' sbyong chen po'i spyad sngar tshar/ sa par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srung tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa myod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa
256b6(mdo): de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des sten pa rdzogs pa dang / de dag dge' slong gi dngos por gyu rad to// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sun chu klu 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung gnyis
256b7(mdo): 'khor nyis rgya lnga bcu'i gnyis brgyal lnga bcu'i dngar/ chu klung na ran 'dza' na'i 'dug kyi 'gra kyi sti gnas na dka' thub spyod do// chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung spu gnyis kyis gang ba'i/ 
256b8(mdo): dong / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril pa spyi la lugs dang / glugs gzar de dag chu klung ne ran 'dza' na nas khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam tu ses te/ bdag/ 
257a1(mdo): cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de rnams/ rgyal po 'am chom rkunan/ me 'am chus nyes dmyigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur rad grang // ma la bdag cag kyis tshangs
257a2(mdo): pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung sun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung spun ral pa can tshol zhing / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa cad gyi sti
257a3(mdo): gnas gangan ba der song pa dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ltang rgyas 'od srung ngal bcad sA phye sde sbyar dgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos mnyan pa'i phyir
257a4(mdo): 'khod do// chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung gis lteng rgyas 'od srung la bcan sgra phyi bsnam sbyang bgos na sabacom ldan 'das kyi gyar ldanas chos mnyan
257a5(mdo): phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mtho das kya dang ldan / kyipa 'ong srungangs bcad la 'di ska ces smras so// 'od ral bcad 'dis tshig yin mag
257a6(mdo): 'od srung 'di dag ni mchog yin te de la yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung sun gnyis 'di snyam du sos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing
257a7(mdo): chom bshad pa yang mchog pa yid pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyid da ltang lteng rgyas 'ang srung ngal bcan bcas nas la brgya'i nyi shu lhag yod panas 'khogs zhugs pa/ mag ta'i phyi rnams kyis
257a8(mdo): 'akum snye rgyam/ tha mar byas/ brjod par byasamachod par byas shing dgral bcom par 'grar 'di yang lan gnyis kyi ba dge' sbyong chen po'i spyan sngang rab tu byung bar
257b1(mdo): blangs kyis ma la bdag cag kyang dge' sbyong chen po'irgyad sngar tshangs par spyod pa sred par bya'o// gam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// dge' sbyong chen
257b2(mdo): po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / sten pa rdzogs pa dge' srong kyi dngos po thob par lhan bdag cag dge' sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par 'byor
257b3(mdo): ba spyad par bgyi'o// khyed kyis 'khor la la ltas sam/ dge' sbyong chen po me bltas lags so// 'od srung dag de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig/ 'di ltar khyed lta bu'i myig grags
257b4(mdo): pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la ltab ste/ dgos pa yin do// de ras chu klung 'od srung dang / ka ya 'od srung yun rang gyi sti gnas ka pad pa der dong ste phyin nas/ bram
257b5(mdo): ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// di de spre // bram ze'i khye'u dag she/ sa par gyis zhig/ kho bo cag ni dge' spyod chen po'i rgyan
257b6(mdo): sngar tshangs par pyad pa 'apyod da/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ 'khar po dag bdag cag cung zad mi 'tshal ba de thams cad ni 'khan po dag la brten gnas lags kyis gal te 'khar po dag dge la skyong chen
257b7(mdo): po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag kyang 'khan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / 
257b8(mdo): ya 'od srung sun 'khor nyis brgyal lnga bcu' dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyi nad nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ngo to// dge' spyod chen po bdag cag gis 'khor
258a1(mdo): la bltas lags te/ dge' sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge' slong gi dngos po thob par ldan bdag cag
258a2(mdo): 'dage' spyod chen po'i spyad sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srung dag tshur sheka tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // des
258a3(mdo): dge' slong dngos por gyu rad pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de rab tu byung ba rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgyas su ci tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga la 'od srung ga par
258a4(mdo): der gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ga ya byond nas ga ya'i nyog mchod rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams ca/ da rab tu byung ba'i dge' slong stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
258a5(mdo): so de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge' slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum pos 'doms par mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang kund brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul/ 
258a6(mdo): dang ngo // de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yid te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar phyogs su mnyam par bzhag pa na nyid kyi padan gyi nang du kyi snang bar gyur cig/ shar phyogs kyi bar
258a7(mdo): snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod laman pa bzhi'i mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad pa dang / me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
258a8(mdo): par zhugs par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las/ 'od zer na ba sna tshogs dag 'byind par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ sngon po
258b1(mdo): se po dang / dmar po dang / dgar po dang / leb nan dang shes kyil dgan/ cho 'brul byung du yang stod par mdza // rtswa'i samadapa 'ab bar yang das/ kwa'i spangs pa/ 
258b2(mdo): ni chu' grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do// sku'i stod las 'bang bar mdzad la/ sku'i spang las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs
258b3(mdo): la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang rnams su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis bstan padas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ 
258b4(mdo): dge' slong gi dge' 'dun gyi gung la bangan pa shams pa nyid la bcu/ gas te/ de la 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi so 'drad la yin do// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kur brjod pa'i cho 'phrul
258b5(mdo): ni 'di yin te/ dge' slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o// khyed kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o// 'di ni rtogs shig/ 'di ni ma rtogs shig 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 
258b6(mdo): 'di ni yid la ma byed cing / 'di ni spongs shig/ 'di ni ma spang shig/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon gsum du byas la rdzogs par bgyis te mnos shig/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi kund brjod pa'i cho 'phrul
258b7(mdo): yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yid te/ dge' slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin do// dge' slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhen/ dge'
258b8(mdo): spyod dag myi ga dang / gzugs dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa ku nad tu 'bar ba yin zhing myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis nang kyi tshong ba bde la ba'am/ sdug bsngal
259a1(mdo): ba 'am/ bde' ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge' slong dkan pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
259a2(mdo): yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar zhing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis dang gyi tshor ba bde' ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde la ba
259a3(mdo): yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// gar gyis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang kyi ma dang / gtil mug gi mes
259a4(mdo): kun tu 'bar/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde' ba dang / 'khrug pa ste/ bsdug bsngal
259a5(mdo): kyis kun tu 'bar ba'o// zhes sla'o// de la 'don bam ma ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstad pa'i tshe 'khyil yin do// sa kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na ldan thams cad ra
259a6(mdo): can du gyur pa'i/ dge' slong gi dge' 'dud lend pa byed par bag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dedas bcom ldan 'das ga la'i mchod rted la/ sdod zas cad ras pa
259a7(mdo): can du gyur pa'i dge' slong thams cad dgra' ba com pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu spyod pa yongs su zad payang
259a8(mdo): dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba/ sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mya rdos ljongs rgyu ba na/ shag
259b1(mdo): kya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang sar 'angos su ba skal ldan zhing Na'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i ste gnas dang / hacang kya ring ba zhig tu byung ba bras the ma can 'khan dang / lus mkha rnams kyilags te/ 
259b2(mdo): khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas mde 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po chos dang / ldan pa 'chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba rin po che sde bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te// de'i rim mo
259b3(mdo): sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / d+ha rin po che dang / nong bu rin po che dang / bud myed rin po che dang / ma
259b4(mdo): bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po che rin po che dang yin no// de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'gyur te// dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol kyi sde
259b5(mdo): tu 'jom pa de rgya mtsho' la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par/ gnod par sngo ba myed cing 'tshe ba myed par 'di nyid cha/ pa myed cing / mtshon gyis 'da' ba myed pa chos dang 'thun
259b6(mdo): zhing snyoms par pa ba ste gnas par gyurang to// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos tur smrig bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas/ khyim das khyim byed par rab tu byung bar gyur dang / de
259b7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstand pa zhig thos so// thos nas kyang ma ka da'i rgyal po bzo'
259b8(mdo): sbyangs gzugs can snying po ka pan pa der song ste phyi nad nas/ ma ga da'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyend par mdzad dung gsol/ bdag cag 'dir
260a1(mdo): lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shag kya rnas kyi gzhon nu kangs r-i'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du sman par
260a2(mdo): grags par 'gyur bar lung bstand pa zhig thos so// zhes bya ba'i bar du gor ma bzhin no// lha de khum shig lta bas gtso bo bas ces gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// grong ba dag shag kya rnams kyi gzhon nu ka pa?
260a3(mdo): pa'i ngos zhes bya ba nas grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin te/ lha re khrus shig lta bas gtso bo zhes gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// zhes khyed cag de gang pa s+thA / deci'i phyi na na/ grong
260a4(mdo): pa dag shaka kya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes bya ba lang sa byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin te/ ka lang te 'khor las skur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te sA dang
260a5(mdo): kha spu bregs te// kos ngur smyig bgos nas dad pas ra dag pa 'kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung bar gyur/ ti// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par
260a6(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig tsams ldanas pang grags par 'gyur dang nga'i nyan thos su khas thang bar bya'o// de nas pa ga ka'i rgyal po bzo'i sbyangs gzugs cad rnying po sring kyi mang
260a7(mdo): bzangs kyi gzhil la 'dug nas/ smod pa bzhi la la smond par byed de// kye la bdag gi yul du 'jig rten kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
260a8(mdo): rig pa dang 'bas su ldan pa bdel bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyang ba bla na myed pa lha dang byi rnams kyi stond pa/ bcom ldan 'das byung ba dang
260b1(mdo): de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'grol ba dang / nye bar song ba dang / des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kying chos bkang pa de dag shes dang / bdag gis chos bshad pa rnam
260b2(mdo): bslab pa de yang bdag gis grangs te/ gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge' slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge'aslong dag pa sha nga'i rgyal po bzo' sbyang
260b3(mdo): gzugs cad stong pa de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi' la 'dug nas/ smod pa bzhi'i lnga smond par byed de// kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rtend kyi stod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa
260b4(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar du kong ma bzhin no// ma ga ta'i rgyal po bzo' sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgyu zhing / shag kya rnams kyis gzhon
260b5(mdo): nu kangs ri'i ngos chu'i ska ldan shing rta'i 'gram na drang srong sa ra skya'i sti gnas dang / ha cang myi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang wa da pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang lhas mkhan zhes bya ba nas
260b6(mdo): 'jig rte nad du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// zhes lung stond pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de skra dang kha spu bregs te kos ngur skyigs bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
260b7(mdo): khyim myed par rab tu byung ba de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngod par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// de nas de dag ga yas/ mchod rten la sngon pas cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge' slong
260b8(mdo): stong po thams cad kyang dgra' bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kund tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag/ 
261a1(mdo): pa'i shes pas sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ma ga ta'i rgyal po bzo' sbyangs gzugs can snying po ga par
261a2(mdo): ba der dong ste lhags nas/ mag ta'i rgyal po bzo'i sbyangs gzu na snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyend par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'did lha'i yul d+hu bad/ shag
261a3(mdo): dan rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de swa dang kha spu bregs te/ gos drang smrig bgos nas
261a4(mdo): dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung ba de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog/ das par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag ka ya na ga ya'i 'gro'i mchod
261a5(mdo): rtend la sngon thams cad rald pa can du gyur pa'i dge'// slong thams cad kyang dgra' bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dga'i shes pas/ sems shi nad tu rnam par
261a6(mdo): gro bsha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ lha de la bkur b+hi mdzod cig dang / de ltar na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso' bor 'gyur ro// de nas ma ka ta'i rgyus
261a7(mdo): po bzo'i sbyangs gzugs can zhing zas kyi zhogs nom/ kha kye dang rje chur byed khyod bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der song sa myod dam/ mam 'tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyin pas gcig
261a8(mdo): la 'go bas phyag byas la/ gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam pa ba chung ba 'am/ 'tsho 'am/ bskyod pa yang dam/ stobs dang ldan pas dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la/ 
261b1(mdo): 'di gad ces kyang gas la yom ldan 'das dge' slong gi dge' 'dud dang babs pa gi yang sri 'the'i bar tu bza' dang chos gos dang / bsod goms dang/ gzims sa dang srung
261b2(mdo): dpyad kyi rkyenang sma nad dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab du gshegs su gsol cig// lha ba byazhin 'tshal zhes kyi des ma ga 'i rgyam gyi
261b3(mdo): btso sbyongs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste phyi nang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug na
261b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la myi des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ka ta'i rgyal po gzo' sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag byas
261b5(mdo): nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam zhes byab nas reg par spyod dam/ zhes bya ba'i bar du kong ma bzhin ru ste/ snyun gsol lags so// kye myi khyod dang / ma ka tra
261b6(mdo): rgyal po bzo' sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde' bar gyur cig/ btsun pa ya ka ta'i rgyal po bzo' sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge' slong
261b7(mdo): gyi dge 'a 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ ji ltar 'tsho'i bar du ni bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyend smand dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen
261b8(mdo): bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchil lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas myi des bcom ldan 'das cad
262a1(mdo): kyi gsum sa na par rigs ldan 'das kyi pa gnyis sa tshan pas byug byas / ldan 'das kyi ung d+ha pa nga // da po ma ldan 'as ljong
262a2(mdo): ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge' slong gi dge' 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgral bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes nas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar zhwa stan
262a3(mdo): dang thabs gcig tu pa ka ta'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs par/ ma ga ta rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab tu gnas par ltang brag gi tshal yod pa ka bad pa der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das leg
262a4(mdo): byang rab tu gnas su byond nas/ ma ga ta pa rnams kyi mchod rte nang legs par rab gnas lhang brag gi tshil na yod pa na bzhugs so// ma ka ta'i rgyal po bzo'i sbyangs gzugs can
262a5(mdo): snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams ca dang la la cad du rgyus 'i dge' slong stong kyi dge' 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas so sa shining tunas par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste ma
262a6(mdo): 'i ljongs tu ni dashegs med mig tas kyim me da legs pa gaganas yang nag gi na yang bgapa pa gan da na chen

262a8(mdo): stong rnyed dang / lhan cig 'khor brgya 'a phrag du ma dang / rgyal po 'khab nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na
262b1(mdo): de'i shing rta'i kha lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyu dad ta/ nges bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can chung yad cig byas pam sa gyur nga thang snyas mo// lha rnams kyis de la sprum brgyas po chen po khyod kyisas so spyon can
262b2(mdo): byas yod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par kyang pa gang yin pa de dag brtson rar 'dug gise de dag 'on cig/ rgyal pos smras pa gal te de ltar da gdon no// zhes rgyal po'i btson rnams 'dod tu
262b3(mdo): bcug go// yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na/ de'i dbu' rgyan sgo la thug go// des yang bsams pa bdag gis ni gang don myi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te/ des na bdag la lhas ngan pa gzhan
262b4(mdo): sgo la dbu' rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo// lha de nas kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mdo kyi khyod dang lhan gcig las mtshungs par myang ba gang yin pa de dag
262b5(mdo): cig ni 'dus kha gcig ni yul ljongs gzhan ka ge mo zhig bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig/ la los yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo 'tshigs thams cad bkug
262b6(mdo): de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khro nyis stong dang / nape 'thong brta pa'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang / ma ka ta'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag brgyal stong phrag tu ma dang / lhan cig rgyal po'i

268a7(mdo): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yid byung ba na 'dod chags dang bral lo// 'dod chags dang bral na/ rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol/ 
268a8(mdo): pa na bdag gi skye ba myed do// tshangs par spyod pa bstend to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan myi shes so// zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs
268b1(mdo): 'di bshad pan la ga ta'i rgyal po bzo'i sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad waM dang ma ka da'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bru brag du ma chos rnams la/ rtsab kyi gyig / tshul byed cing rjem dang
268b2(mdo): ba skyes so// de nas ma ka ta'i rgyal po bzo'i sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / 
268b3(mdo): the tsom las rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring kyi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis gyi bkri' ba dang / stond pas bstand pa'i chos rnams la gyi 'jigs pa thob nas/ bstan pa las langs te tha kos phrag
268b4(mdo): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag mi 'phags pa
268b5(mdo): mngon par 'phags so// bdag ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'angs dang / chos dang / dge' 'dun la skyabs su mchi' lags kyis dge'u snyen du bzung drug sol/ de bsan
268b6(mdo): cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchil bar mngon par dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / dka' srong ba gyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa
268b7(mdo): ci srid 'tsho'i ba dun bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyenang slad kyi yo byad rnams kyis/ bsnyen bkur bgyid legs na/ bcom ldan
268b8(mdo): 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis a ga ta'i rgyal po bzo'i sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas ma ga ta'i rgyal po gzo' sbyangs
269a1(mdo): gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang myi gsung bas gnang par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas kyibacom ldan 'das kyi
269a2(mdo): spyad snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das mag nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / rgyal po khal du byonang nas rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal
269a3(mdo): po'i khaban mu stegs yang dag rgyal bcan zhes bya ba skyes nas/ ring po la lon pa mede rnams kyi sto nga pa dus byas par gyur pa dang / de rnams kyi napad nye rgyal dang / ba das smos zhes bya
269a4(mdo): ba gnyis tshogs yongs su ltud pa dang / tshogs kyi 'dren par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yongs su 'dren pa na/ de gnyis kyis dzadi ltang yu'u cag las gcig gis bdud rtsi sngar rnyed kyang da ga
269a5(mdo): smra bar bya'o// zhes dam bcas pa byas so// de nas tshe/ dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos// ltung zad/ dang / chos gos thogs te 'grol ba dang / ldog pa dang
269a6(mdo): cung ba lta ba dang / na par lta ba dang / snum pa dang / ra~M ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung med thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms zhugs so// 
269a7(mdo): 'i sa po sum pa gagad zhugs/ dang ldan pa la 'grol ba dang / ga nga/ na / 
269a8(mdo): dang bskum pa dang/ brkyang ga dang / bA ma sbyar dang mags dang / srung bad thogs pa mdzes pa rgyal po'i kha ban pasod snyoms la nu ba~M 'ag ring po khong nas mthong ngo // mdzang/ 
269b1(mdo): nas kyang 'di snyam chu sems te/ rgyas pa 'ikha ba 'ad ngarab tu byung baji snyed lpags shing gnas pa dag las 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i mang la lta bu'i bdag gis sngon par 'ga' song po ma na/ 
269b2(mdo): kis// ma la bdag gis de'i gan du song ste/ dge' slong khyod kyi stond pa ni gang yin// kang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la dga' zhes dri'o// snyam du rig nas/ lam po che ni/ 
269b3(mdo): na 'gro ba dang / ldog pas cher sdod cing 'dug go// de nas tshe drang ldan pa rta thul kund tu rgyu nye rgyal ka par ba der song ste// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smra so// 
269b4(mdo): dge' srong dag khyod kyi stond pa ni gang yin/ gang gi phyir/ nau rab tu byung / su'i chos la dka'/ tshe dang lA dan pa shag kya'i sras kyi dge' sbyong gu lu ta ma shaka kya'i rigs
269b5(mdo): las skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig dag bkos de dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim khyed par rab tu byung ba zhig yod de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
269b6(mdo): mngod par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kho lo lci ston pA ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no// kha ba tu nyung ngo // kho bo ni de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo // kho bo de'i chos la dga'o// 
269b7(mdo): dgel slong dag de'i phyir chos ston cig ldan pa kho bo nini gzhon pa dang / rab tu byung ba gsar bas/ de'i phyir kho bos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasapa ya
269b8(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i stand pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stand pa ma yin te/ 'onod kyang 'di ltar de'i don bstand par bya'o// dge la slong kho bo la ni don dgos
270a1(mdo): kyis kyig nagan bus pa pas kyang gyi tshad kyis do na yang yang rung / gangs chung 'ad cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lta thus kyis de la tshi tshigs su bcad pas smras
270a2(mdo): napas nga das rgyalal byung ba dang/ de sbyin du gag ga yin pa'ang // de bzhin gshegs panyid kyis bka' stsal to// de gad gsung ba la tshul can dga' tha
270a3(mdo): kyi nam grangs 'di bshad par/ kun tu mtshos rnams la chos kyi phyig rdul byed cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas kun rgya nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos
270a4(mdo): rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las/ rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gi da myo 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis myi dkro' ba dang / ston
270a5(mdo): pas bstan pa'i chos la myi 'jigs pa thob nas/ ro swA da slad nas laka pa g.yas brkyang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ka la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de
270a6(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa// 'chi 'a byed kya dbyed pa'i// go/ 'phang 'di la rjes su
270a7(mdo): rtogs/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das dang lhag la bzhugs// tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i kha ban 'ong ba'i tshal phyag lan ta ka gnas pa 'di nyid ra'o// de nas kun tu chu nye rgyas
270a8(mdo): dang ldan pa ta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par btod pa dang / rjes su yid rang pa byas te// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la 'go' bos phyag nas// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
270b1(mdo): lan gsum skor ba byas te sor nas/ ku na tu rgyu par nas skyes ga la ba deng song ngo // kun tu bar nas skyes kyis kund tu rgyu nye rgyal zag ring po kho nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kun tu rgyu
270b2(mdo): nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod ni dab pa po rnams dang / bzhin mdog ni yongs su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni yongs su karAn/ khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dang / cha
270b3(mdo): ldan pa rnyed do// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos stond cig/ de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang // de'i rgyu dang de 'gog
270b4(mdo): gapa yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te// de dag gsung po'i tshul can dge' spyod che// tshe dang ldan dpang dung yang lan cig brjod cig/ tshe dang ldan pa brjod
270b5(mdo): par bya'o// chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / ne/ sa pa las rdzogs pa snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam gra sa 'di bshad pa na/ kun tu rgyu ba nas skyes chos rnams
270b6(mdo): la chos kyi myig rtul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas kund tu rgyu pa nas skyes chos mthong ba dang / chos zos dang / chos rig pa dang / ro stod srang nas/ chos kyi ga ting slebs pa
270b7(mdo): dang som nyi las rgald pa dang / the tsomo las rga la pA dang/ gzhan ga rjod myi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis myi dkril ba dang / bstond pas bstand pa'i chos nas la/ myi 'jigs pa tho
270b8(mdo): nas/ ro stod sra nas lag pa g.yas pa/ rgya ste/ gyi kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyang ba bdud te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos
271a1(mdo): 'di da/ legs 'bye / sngun ma masa'o// 'ayos su byed pa // ga' bang 'dis rjes su / dedang ldan pa
271a2(mdo): ldan 'das der ltag la bzhugs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab ma'i tshal bya ka lan 'da' ga'i gnas 'di nyid 'o// tshe dang ldan pa tshu non/ tsham ldan 'das de'i gyad mA mtshangs par
271a3(mdo): sri la kyang par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir rje 'khab la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu kyi grags pa dang ldan pa zhes rab ca du gyu nga bdag gis 'a khongs su ba ni legs pa yod do// de nas kun
271a4(mdo): du nye rgyal dang pa nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khre'u rnams la de smrab pa/ bram ze'i khri'u rnams zhes par byas shig/ dbacag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga batshangs par kyang pa
271a5(mdo): spyod par byedan/ byed cag ci ltar byedamakhon po gnyis bdag ca gzung zad ci 'das bag pa lags pa de thams cad na po gnyis la brten nas 'al ba lags da/ gas te 'ja
271a6(mdo): ma ldan 'das kyi sun ma macangs par sdung pa sa spyong / bdag gakya ga nyis su rab tu zung 'angs sungs tu byung bar brgya'o// rnam pa'i gyi thu pas de de'i dums pa' 'a gyis ni/ 
271a7(mdo): de nas sunapa tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / ba nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgyal ldi bcu la gnyis lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das gas pa der dong ngo // de 'i can bcom ldan 'das dge' slong gi 'khor brgya tha
271a8(mdo): du ma'i tshong gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu chu nye rgyas dang / pa padas skyes gnyis pag ring po kho nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dag 'grong rnams la
271b1(mdo): bka' stsa lung bya / dge' slong dag khyed kyis klags pa'i tshogs yongs su srung ba tshogs yongs su 'dred pa tshogs kyi mdun nas 'ong ba 'dis se nye hu~M ma dang papangs byes gnyis mthong ngam
271b2(mdo): btsun pa mthong ngo / 'di gnyis ni zung dang / zung kyi mchog dang / zung bzang por gyur te/ gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// ka cig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa
271b3(mdo): rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas dge' slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// stond pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa// skyes bu dbang po mkhyen mthar mi byed// bcom ldan sring
271b4(mdo): pa thar mdzad pa// grogs po nye rgyal ba nas skyes// 'od ma'i nga tshal tu ma phyi nad par// de ltar 'chi ba gzigs kyu ra nas/ tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni// 'di nyid nga'i nyan rdos
271b5(mdo): kyi// zung mchog 'gyur zhes nges bstan te/ cig ni rdzu la phrul ldan pa'i mchog/ gcig ni shes rab ldan pa'i// mchog tu rgyur bar lung bstan mdzad// de nas kun tu rgyu
271b6(mdo): nye rgyal dang / pa pa nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga na pa der dong ste phyind nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pas la 'di skad ces
271b7(mdo): gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge' srong snang ba/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par s+yar
271b8(mdo): pa myod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge' spong tshur shog/ ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing dge' slong dag tshor shog/ tshangs par spyod pa spyod cing ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
272a1(mdo): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'a'i 'dug kho na shA phye ba dang / ba dang / sngam sbyar gyod par gyud te// lagar lung gzed thogs se pa sna dang lasu zhag bdun myos patsam dang / 
272a2(mdo): dge' slong sten pa rdzogs nas lo brgyal lon pa'i spyod lam lta bung gnas par gyur to// yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chur zhig bka' stsal pas/ bA gyi sdom spyad gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing
272a3(mdo): modo la dbang po rabazhir gnas gyur da te/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyurang // de nas dka' slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos// lhung gzed dang / chos gos
272a4(mdo): thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab du byam de snyoms dpal zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po 'khab kyi mye gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can kyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu byung zhing snyen pa rdzogs nas/ 
272a5(mdo): ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing / mngon par myi dga' pa de dag gisadage' slong de dang / de dag mthong da/ sa / co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas
272a6(mdo): ma ka ta dag gi// grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyas pa'i sram khring das// byis da ci zhig dkro' bar bya// des dge' slong rnams spa gong zhing // kyi dgal la dang / kyi la
272a7(mdo): bskyed par gyur to// de nas dge 'aslong ba tu ma sod/ po'i khab tu 'ab gams rgyas dmams kyi/ rgya rnam ma rnams kyi yi na pas srung gzed pacom nam ma
272a8(mdo): pag nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ bsdug bsngal zhing yid kyi bdel bas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong nas phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi napas gnyis la 'go bos
272b1(mdo): phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'do // phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dgel slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsum
272b2(mdo): ba 'dir bdag cag dge' slong rab tu mang po dag lnga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung zed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / dedas rgyal po'i khab kyi khyi gang

272b6(mdo): kyi khyi skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces/ 'di la dpa' chen bde'i gshegs dag/ da bo'i chos kyis khrid mdzad pa// de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad de// mkhas pa su zhig myi bzod byed ces
272b7(mdo): brjod da rgyal po'i khang ba tu kyi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du byed par 'gyur ro// de nas dge' slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro
272b8(mdo): sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te// rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / ded rgyal po'i khab kyi khyi gang bdag rgyal bcan gyi bu u stegs can gyi gnas
273a1(mdo): rab tu byung zhing bsnyed pa rdzogs nas ring po la yod pas yid pa rangs ni pa mngon par gyi dga' ba de dag gis dge' slong de dang de dag mthong nas/ co 'dzin tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 
273a2(mdo): sangs rgyas ma gang dag gi// grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba kun du khridad// phyi dang cang ci nig dkri' bar bya// de nas dgel grong zhig kyis de'i mtshigs

273a4(mdo): ces smras pa dang / rgyal po'i khab tu myi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am// spobs pa gang yin pa de thams cadakyithams cad du myed par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom
273a5(mdo): ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'gon byed pas sbyid kyi / na dka' ban bzhugs so// ko ma la'i rgyal pogs ma rgyal gyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la gIni yig bsku
273a6(mdo): ba// lha dges paskyed du gsol// khyod kyis sras kyis bdud kyi mo ba das bdud cis 'gro ba 'jim par byed do// zhes spang ba rgyal po 'as chab kyis thos nas pho nya btang / 
273a7(mdo): ba las deng nyid su byu ste/ po nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid tu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to// rgyal po 'as cangal ka 'gro pa la ta
273a8(mdo): nas pho nya gar dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo // snyanas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ 'char kas mthong nas
273b1(mdo): smras pa lha khyod ci'i sang du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs kyi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa 'char ka kang gyi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i che kho khos rban
273b2(mdo): kwa 'i gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhor nu dod thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smras so// da ni kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i myi ga tang na 'ga' yang 'phrin yig khyer te myi

273b6(mdo): ras// nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal po ljon zhing la bstan dang // da ni khyod kyi slob ma'i// yal kra lkug ma 'phel 'gyur bas// gzhan ni bde' bas dga' bar 'gyur
273b7(mdo): bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan// gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljod shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na bdag gi phu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bsnun bskrun nas// bu cig yul
273b8(mdo): myos 'bras bus yongs su spyad 'a thob gyur na// de la yon tan 'bras bu mye steng khyod la snying rje byed// gang che thog ma lham pa na/ nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyed rnams ni// shidang
274a1(mdo): che thar phan gdags zhes// khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni// khyod kyi zhi gnas rnyes nas bya// bdag dang gnyis kyi tshogs rnams la// thugs
274a2(mdo): rjes su bzung mdzad de// gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// zhes spang ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer me nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyind pa dang di lam gyis drub par la sa sa dang
274a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gcad gyis gsol pa'i yi ge lags so// zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan

274a5(mdo): 'das kyis bka' stsald pa// 'char ka 'dong ngo // 'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang / lhag par 'dres pa yin pas// de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsold pa/ 
274a6(mdo): bcog ldan 'das gal te myi bzhud dang bdag kyis mthus dkrol bar bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lad pa// gang zhig yul gyi rgya lam chags zhes
274a7(mdo): sred 'gags dkri' ba yod pa la yin pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi 'bye rad ni kar gyi gzhi'i yas dkri'// gang zhig yul gyi rgyal yo ma chags shing // 
274a8(mdo): med 'gas dkripa yod pa la yin pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i skal da mnga' do// gzhil byed marig bgi ga zhi ma yis dkrol// gang zhig bcom ldan rtsegs pa khyed 'gyur zhing/ 
274b1(mdo): 'jig rten la bcos chung zad yod byin pa/ sangs rgyas phyed yul mtha' yas mnga' bde// gzhi' myed de ni gang gis ka'i la yis bkril// lan la spobs pa myed nas gsol// bco/ 
274b2(mdo): ldan 'das mchis te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rig par bgyi'o// 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags// rab tu 'byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu
274b3(mdo): byung shig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas cad la spang mchi' bar dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal pa// 'char ka rab tu byu ba la ji ltar da
274b4(mdo): pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngor byang chub sems dpa' gyur pan// ya ba dang yum dang 'khan po slob dpod dang / za ba dang tha ma'i gnasas
274b5(mdo): bu rnams kyis chos dang 'thun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' ma ra slar ma zlog pas// 'char kas gsol pa// bco ma ldan 'das gal te de ltar na rab tu byung lags so// de nag
274b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsa lad pa/ sha ri'i bu 'char kas 'di'i yun ring po 'don dang / phan pa dang bdel ba'i phyir rab tu byung shika/ btsun
274b7(mdo): pa byAka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/ 'char kas rab tu grub ste/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas nas/ ku na tu gyod pa'i chos
274b8(mdo): ngag de la rgyas par sbas nas/ 'char kas 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te// deng phan chad bud myed dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar myi bya'o// zhes bya ba dag go// btsun pa bka'
275a1(mdo): bzhin 'tshal zhes 'ar gas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la 'ag bos phyag byas te sa podas// bcom ldan 'das ga na pa des song gyi dang pa dang / bco ldan
275a2(mdo): kyi napas gnyis la 'gazos phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di ska ces g.yo yod to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi pa bachis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bya me
275a3(mdo): lakhar ka song la khyod med kho dang rgyal po'i khab du ma 'jus par bskol la sdod la shaka kya'i dge' slong 'ongs so// zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gyod cig zer na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs
275a4(mdo): nas gal te gag kya'i dge'aslong gi 'am yang yod ngas zhes ming na med do// zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nga ma ngon thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing mabyang 'di
275a5(mdo): 'dra'am zhes 'phrin/ 'di 'dra'ang pa'i ma byad 'di 'dran zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab du ya gnas par gyi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu thams cad grub pa yang
275a6(mdo): 'di rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par gyi b+ha'o// gal te gzhon nu dadu thams cad grub pa mas sa sa/ gas te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dzin/ dkon pa'am/ gtsug la
275a7(mdo): khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// g.ye te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'phrin/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul gyi rnam pa zos te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon du don thams cad grub pabyod do zhes 'dzin/ 
275a8(mdo): byod no zhes brjod par bya'o// ci sring cig na byod zhes 'dzin zhag bdun lor ra'o// zhes brjod par bya'o// nges gsol dab/ bcom ldan 'das mchil lags so// bcom ldan 'das
275b1(mdo): kyis kyagatha kyang paban// sa bdag rnam san tshogags te// lha rnams mams pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // de bzhin pas pa gtan pa kyi/ sems bskyed pasan mas nam / 
275b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'ja rA ka de ji ltar skad gcig de nyid la grong khyer seng skya'i gzhing song ba de ltar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa'ang ga bcom ldan 'das la dang pa drag po skyes par rgyas
275b3(mdo): 'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shag kya'i dge' slong mchis so// nen thos cig/ na dad kyis smras pa/ kyigag kya 'di 'phong gnan na la da/ 'dad/ yod/ dad kyis rgyam pos lda / zhan kya di
275b4(mdo): mtsham// rgyal thos sprul pa dang du 'ong zhig de kya rgya kyi dun la lagasazung sas tshung ban zungs rnamapas nis// 'di ci yid 'char kas su rnas pa// lha bcom ldan 'das kyis// sangs rgyas kyi'o nya
275b5(mdo): ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// zhes bka' rtsa lang nas ches 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi bar ga rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag thos
275b6(mdo): cad kyis ma zhud nas// stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug du bcug go// de'i don tu chu btsags pa dang / 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar
275b7(mdo): zhi ba dang / dul par gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstand pa'i cho ga yongs su longs spyod do// rgyal pos de la rtags nas ngo mtshar skyes na smras pa// 'char ka ji gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang
275b8(mdo): 'di 'dra ba nye bar zhi ba yin no// 'char kas smras pa lha bdag kyi dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so// dper na ji ltar na ri rab dang yungs 'bru' bzhin no// rgya mtsho'i dang myig rjes
276a1(mdo): bzhin no// nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/ nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no// rgyal spro zas katsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di
276a2(mdo): 'dra zhipacha byang 'di 'dra'/ lha 'di 'dra zhipas byad kyang 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po bas r+b+ba nga rgyal nas sa la 'gyel pa dang / tshulang du btub nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu dod thams cad grub
276a3(mdo): ba byod na/ 'char kas smras pa lnga byon no// dus ci tsam na dgung bdun la mda'o// rgyal po zas ka tsang gyis blon po rnams la lko ma Sh+yaMH/ shes ldan gzhon nu dodan thams cad grub pa byod par 'gyur gyis rgyal po'i
276a4(mdo): khab dang po brad kyi byi dor byos shig/ 'char kas smras pa bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par myi mdzad do// N+yaHpos smras pa gang du bzhugs// 'char kas smras pa/ dkon pa
276a5(mdo): 'am gtsug lag khang du'o// rgyalnga po zas gtsang gis smras pra 'char kas shu ga lag khang mi 'dra ni yin/ me ngu lA pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal rnam par ri mor bris te bstan
276a6(mdo): to// de nas rgyal pos thon pa rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dkan mo nga'i kun dgal ba'i rgyal byed kyi tshal sbyin pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang brad 'acu 'a drug cig tu chug shig/ 
276a7(mdo): lha ka bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnabs kyis rgyal po zas gcad las mnyan nas n+ya gro da'i kun dka' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi na pa pa tsug lag zhang chen po bcu' dang // khang phrad bcu'i drug rtsig tu bcug go// 
276a8(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'dis kyis tshe dang ldan pa melu 'gal gi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad pa/ mye la 'gal gi myo sngo la dge la slong dzas la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te// ya ba sras/ 
276b1(mdo): na chu med khyin kyis su zhigs b+higs de tsa migs dag 'a ga ga/ zhes bzhin du/ rgya po bka' bzhin / zhes po dang 'dul lo 'gas gi naman rtsal ldan 'dam
276b2(mdo): 'kho das na 'dod gas ra 'a sang sa ngas mas rtso gas kyi
276b3(mdo): ba su zas rje mthom rdzoms kyis nang ba sdus/ mnod pa mi sabya la sa mas/ pa'i pa mchog kyis nang sa mal 'ad 'dred pa la
277a1(mdo): ra kyis bskor ba lta bu myig lci bzang klu'i tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu nam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis skor pa lta bu thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskang
277a2(mdo): pa lta bu// brgya 'byin sum bcu la rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis skor ba lta ru/ das ma kyi kyan kya na gyi sa yang babyed Ir chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po de badregs pa dang bral ba lta bu dbang
277a3(mdo): rnams shi nad tu rgyal ba dang / spyod lam kyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcul rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas rgyad pa/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas/ 
277a4(mdo): pa 'od 'dos gang gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ba'i 'od/ gzer gyis stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lhur kun danas mdzes pa/ stobs bcul dang / myi 'jigs
277a5(mdo): ba bzhi'i dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar ka zhag pa gsu dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge' slong kyi dge' 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byond to// 
277a6(mdo): rgyal po bas gcad kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to/ zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsa kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir rdo la dang / gyo mo dang / gseg
277a7(mdo): ma rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin tu nim po 'i phog por nye bar zhi zhes// dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po sbyangs te/ gang yang 'beb chu ro hi ta gnas kang yang na kro de'i
