300b2(mdo): ta ma dag rgyal po gros pa nga po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab dro byung ste// de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun sel ces bya ba byung ngo // ko'u tam dag rgyal po mun
300b3(mdo): sel gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya'atham pa yang grong khyer ba ran ser byung ste/ de rnams kyi am ni rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo // ko lu ta ma dag rgyal po dbang phyug chen
300b4(mdo): po'i sde'i bu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brkyang khri bzhi'i stong grong khyer rtsa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha la ni rgyal po dbang phyu ka chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo // ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po dbang
300b5(mdo): phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po stong yang grong khyer klu 'dzin su byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha man+ti n+ya bo dka' thub ces bya ba byung ngo // ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po dka' thu
300b6(mdo): khyod kyi bri dang cha ba dang pa tha dang su ma'i drung la rgyas pa 'argyang khri'i bano'i spyong yang grong khyer cha can dubyung ste/ dernams kyis lani rgyal po sa'i gdong 'as bya ba byung ngo // ko 'u ta ba dag rgyal tho ma 'o gdang gsu dang / 
300b7(mdo): chu bo dang yang tsha dang su ma'i rgyung rgyal po 'bu yang grong khyim pa yad ser byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha a ni rgyal po sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo // ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po 'ibu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha
300b8(mdo): sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang krong khyer dmag gis myi tshugs par 'byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa 'dzi nad ces bya ba blang ngo // ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa 'dzi nad kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang yang cha dang / sum
301a1(mdo): tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri'i bzhi'i stong grong khyer mi hi lir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po la chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo // ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po lha chen po'i bu dang cha bo dang ya nga \u0f7f dang / 
301a2(mdo): sum cha dang chud kyi rgyal po brgyad khri ba'i 'i stong yang grong khyem gyi lhang drang srong ga tshangs par gyod pa la kyang de// de rnams kyi tham ni rgyal pos kyang la las bya ba byung ngo // mu khrung 'dzid las 'bying ba dang / sra'i
301a3(mdo): pa'i mu khyud dang / rko ba dang / nye bar rko ba dang / rko bar yod dang / kun nas rko ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / thos pa'i sde dang / chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa chen po dang / rtogs
301a4(mdo): pa'i sde dang / mya ngan myed dang / mya ngan dang bral dang / brtan pa'i sde dang / rgal bas sbyar dang / glen pasad dang / skye reng dang / phyogs kyi bdag po dang / rdul can dang / bde la byed dang
301a5(mdo): kun dag la dang / me long gdong dang / bskyed pa dang / tu nas bskyed pa dang / skye ba'i lha mchog dang / bza' btung can dang / bza' btung mang pocan dang / dmyi bub dang / gnan nas
301a6(mdo): gyi thub pa dang / gnas pa dang ga nad du gnas pa dang / stobs chen gzhon dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / brten pa zhon dang / gzhu' bcul pa dang / kazhu' brgyal ba dang / gzhu' chu n+ya dang / gzul
301a7(mdo): rgyal dang / kazhu' bkra' dang / gzhu' sra dang / shing rta bcu' ba dang / shing rta brgyal ba dang / shing rta chu bo tsul pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / shing rta snga pa'o// go luta ma dag rgyal po/ 
301a8(mdo): shing rta sra'i bu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha dang / suM tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer kun tu snang bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kr-i kri zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i tshe stond pa de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgral
301b1(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag pa dang 'bras su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten ma byed pa / skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha so bsdu blan byed pa ska ba rtsornams kyi da
301b2(mdo): rgyam bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyad sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' la 'ongs pa na/ byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam bdapa nas tshangs par byed par myang ngo // 
301b3(mdo): dka' ldan gi lha'i ris su skyes so/ ko& ta ma dag rgyas po kr-i kri'i bu legs skyes so/ ko lata ma dag rgyal po legs kyi bu dang / ma tho dang yab Na dang / sum tsha'i drung rgyal po brgyal tho la yang grong khyer
301b4(mdo): 'an rnams na pad/ dag rgyal pon yan 'ganyis pa // 'das dang bang da'o// da
301b5(mdo): nam ngan par byung bar dga'o/ ra kya rgyas srid la mnab dag de'i btsas dang/ mas yin pas rgyas mi byed pa man sa bas sa pa nga/ 
301b6(mdo): nas rgyal por gyur te/ bdag gis kyang tsas dang chos ma yi pas rgyal snying byas nas/ sems can dmyas par gzhos par 'gyur bas/ 'dir ci'i phyir dus lab bcen khyim nas khyim med par gyi
301b7(mdo): du byung bar bya'o// swA du bsams/ rgyal pon pa can gang na ba der song ste phyind pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btas pa yab mkhyed par mdzod cig/ bdag cag ni khyim nas khyim myod
301b8(mdo): par rab tu byung ngo // des smras pa/ dbyugang gi phyir mtshang sbyin mchong bar byed pa byin theg theg par byed pa dang / dka' thub dag bu'i pyod pa de dag de 'di'i chid yon de/ pa'adaman tu sa nong
302a1(mdo): lag 'thil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyuran/ ci'i phyir rab tu byung des smras pa yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo myi thog go// de lta bas na mkhyend par
302a2(mdo): mdzod cig rab tu byung ngo // de nas rgyal pos ka lad kyis chu bar shes nas ka dang ngo // de'i tshe ste gnas zhi ka na drang srong mdog ka na ka zhes bya ba gnas so// de nas gzhon nu go'u ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing bku'
302a3(mdo): la dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde' bas skyes nas drang srong mdog kan ka gang ra ba der song ste phyi nad pa dang / spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis
302a4(mdo): bdag rab tu byung shig des de rab tu byung ngo/ drang srong mdog kan sa kyis 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang cu 'thung bas de yang drang srong ko'ud A tra sreng ko'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// mi tsa ma dus gzhan zhig
302a5(mdo): rgyal bon pa can shi nas gzhon nu ba ra da ma'i ga'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug ga/ ci tsam na dus gzhan zhig na dra srong ko'u tams mkhan po la smras pa/ mkharan po dgon pa'i las kyis
302a6(mdo): 'tsho bar rngo myi thog gis grong khyer 'dab du gnas par bgyi'o// des smras pa bu rung gis grong ngam dkon pa na gnas pa'i drang srang gas ni mdor de dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis khyod song la gru 'dzind kyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i phyis
302a7(mdo): bu byos la 'dug shig mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong ko'u tam gru 'dzind kyi nye 'khor tu la la'i byis bur gnas so// de'i ci grong khyer klu 'dzind da srang 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu ga pa
302a8(mdo): can pad la'i rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas te/ des de la dga' lagur spyod pa'i phyir/ kos dang rgyan dag bskur ro// des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las yang kyi gzhan zhig ka ga pa de thogs pa lnga brgya 'thogs pa 'angs
302b1(mdo): nas bzang mo dka' mgur spyod kyis tshur shog/ des bsams pa gal te bdag so na kar sha pa ne pa lnga brgya' yang myi thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro' ba 'di na legs pa ma yin no snyam nas/ 
302b2(mdo): des bu mo ma ga gzhug ma la smras pa song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo 'amachid nas re shig bdag bskabs ma mchis te/ slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smras so// myi de yang bya ba mang po zhag
302b3(mdo): yin pas de dang de dka' 'akur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo // des bsams pa ni tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems kyang bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba pad ma'i rtsa lag ki gan du song la jo ma'i mching nas
302b4(mdo): sta kon bgyis lags na bskyed mos tshal gang du mchi' zhes smos shi dag des de'i kan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa khyod de dar skad cig la skabs myed skad cig la bskabs yod me'am/ bu mo dang
302b5(mdo): dang rigs myi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa rje'i sras skabs ma ma ches pa ni ma lags mod kyi/ de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag gis skyeb gzhan dang / lhan cig dka' 'gur myang ngo // de'i 'dod chag
302b6(mdo): kyi kun nas bkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing // gnod sems kyis kun nas bkris pa skyes te/ de byi rnams bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bya mo song la bzang mo pad ma'i rtsa lag naser skyed/ mos tshal kag ge mo na/ 
302b7(mdo): tu shog shig ces byos shig/ des song nas bzang mo la smras nas de nas de bskyed mos tshal du song ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de ma smras pa khyod bu mo'i gos dang rgyan gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig
302b8(mdo): dka' 'gur khyod pa rigs so des smras pa rje'i sras de ni bdag gis dongs te / 'onod kyang bud byed ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod pa mdzod cig// de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas btor te bsad do// 
303a1(mdo): de nas bu mo mngag bzhag las jo mas bsad do// jo mo bsad do zhes ku mo spa chen po bton pa skye bo 'i tshigs chen po kun gyis thos nas rmugs pa dang / de mi tsa ma na bsti ga nas de nyid na drang srong ko'u
303a2(mdo): ta ma gnas so// de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de sA ga nas ral kri khrag can drang kro 'u ta ma'i mdun du bod nas skye bo 'tshogs de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// skyes po'i tshogs chen po de ral gri khrag can
303a3(mdo): mthong nas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do// de nas drang srong ko'u ta ma de bskor myi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa// ka'i rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan mtshon thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed
303a4(mdo): dpa des smras pa ci byas de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dka' 'gur spyod nas de bsad do// de/ sa smras pa kho bo ni sdig pa zhi ba'i las de myi byed do// zhes des
303a5(mdo): zhi ba smras kyang skye bo 'tshogs des lag pa phyir ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' 'gur spyad nas de bkum lags so// rgyal
303a6(mdo): pa rnams ni phyi ma yin pas des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur dar rab tu byung ba 'dings spangs kyis gsal shing la gzhan shig/ de nas rab tu byung ba de me tog dra bi ra'i 'breng ba lakul tu btags dang / skyes pa/ 
303a7(mdo): gos sngon po gan pa lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor das lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi'i mdo' dang / sum mdo'o rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te// grong khyer gyi
303a8(mdo): phyogs kyi sgo nas phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no// de'i 'khan po mdog gnag de dus dus su de'i snyiganas su 'gro' ba yin pas tsa com na dus kazhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas/ nges
303b1(mdo): phan tshun btsal bar thams pa dang / tsi tsi ma na de gsal shing la gzhod pa mthong nas de skad kyi gsal zhing mtsho 'ams gang la snying rje ba'i tshig dal bu das bus smras pa kyi hud bu 'don zhig des kyang skad myigasal/ 
303b2(mdo): zhing yi ched la gnad du bab pa'i gnod pa tshor ba skyes nas gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po gzhan zhig ci lags las kas yod// des smras pa bu ma byung ba 'am gnod pa zhig ma byas grangamakhan po bdag gi
303b3(mdo): lus kyi ma byung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no// bu ji ltar shes mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gsond cig/ bded pa dang bden pa'i tshig kang gis bdag lus kyi mabyung gi sems kyis ma'am zhen/ bden pa gang bden
303b4(mdo): pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gser ki kha dog du gyurd cig/ bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog gnag gi
303b5(mdo): pags pa mya snang zhing gser gi kha dog tu gyu rad to// kun tu drang srongamadog gnag gser gyi kha dog tu gyu rad to/ zhes sgra bsgrags pa/ ra de'i mying gser gi mdog ces bya bar gyurd to// de las mchag tu gyuran to// den+DaShA@
303b6(mdo): ma tam ldas pa/ la rnam bdag din pa ga posan 'gro ba ni ga/ skye ba ni gang / tshe myo yi ni gang zhig lags/ des smras pa/ shun senas deng bud byed pa la 'gro ba myed do// da per na khyod kyis bya 'ag byed pa snod lan tha zadag gi rgyal srid kyi srad du smos ma byed pa da/ bdag gzhon nu rab tu byung bas bud byed kyi rgyas kyang mi 'tshal na
303b7(mdo): byas/ phrug la te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig/ mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas da ni bdag gi gnad rnaMs chad cing tshigs rnams phye ste/ 'gum pa gcig tu dran par bas na ji ltar sngon gi yul
303b8(mdo): la pyad pa rjes su dran par gyurd// de'i 'khan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas/ des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po yulang nas cha rad pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char pa chung grang
304a1(mdo): mos reg pas bsdug bsngal rnam par yanand nas/ des sngon gi yul la rjes su dran par byas par rtsams so// gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khu ba'i
304a2(mdo): thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig ltung ngo // bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi'i ste/ bdag sems dpa' dang / 'jig rtend sems dpa' dang / sems can rnaMs kyi las kyi rnam par smind pa sems pa dang / 
304a3(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul sems pa'o// khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis skong nga gnyis su gyur da nas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer kyis sbyind nas rdo lad pa dang // khye'u gnyis shig byung nas de dang hacar yang myi ring ba/ 
304a4(mdo): 'i thung bzhing gi ngal gse bded de gnyis zhugs pa// denapa nyi na 'od ba shin tum 'byung ste/ nyi la'i 'od zer gis drang srong kon na ma drung ban shis ga san zung da dang tu pa'i du
304a5(mdo): da sa ma na 'as palab das gsas na 'khang du sta/ dang rjes 'chi log pa gnyis
304a6(mdo): nas de pan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram ki tshal ka seb tu zhugs pa las tsi tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo // des de gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsams pa zhugs pa dang / drang srong ko'u ta ma'i yin par/ 
304a7(mdo): gyur nas de nas de lhag par bsdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis sti gnas su khrid nas bskrun spyod de// des de gnyis mying btags pa nyi ma sha rad pa'i che nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis sbyind par byas pa las 'dig nyis skyes
304a8(mdo): btsu rapa na kyis mdzin pa yin rnams ban thog sa nas bya 'a gyu na// drang srong rjod pa'i bu la de pas myong gnyis gagon ta pa zhes bya bar gyur to// rang gis nas ga sa ma skyel ba/ 
304b1(mdo): kyi dasus sa yan lag skyes lan pag skyes zhes bya bar gyu tu// bur shing gakyilagase 'ad ba rnyed pa bying bzhi'i bzung pa shing bur pag nas bya bar gyur to// mi yan nus gan na// rgya po sa
304b2(mdo): bu myed par shi nas blon po rnams 'dus nas gros byas par rtsams pa/ shes ldan dag su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dkags smras pa de'i gcen go'u ta ma drang srong rnams kyi dang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal/ 
304b3(mdo): sring 'dod de'i rigs rgyung du 'os pa yin pas dbang bskur ro// de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gsong mdag gi drung du song ste/ sor pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa / drang srong
304b4(mdo): chen po ko& ta ma kar du mchis des smras pa khyed cag kho/ nas bsad do// de rnams kyis smras pa drang srong chen po bdag cag gas de mthong bar yang myi dran da/ ji ltar bsad kho bo bdag cag
304b5(mdo): dran par bya'o// ma 'o nangs so// des de rnams dran pa byas pa dang smras pa drang srong chen po gal te/ de lta na sdig pa / dge' ba'i spyod pa de phying tsab smos pa/ yang bsgrags pa ma yin
304b6(mdo): kas zhog shig/ des sdig pa'i las ni byas 'di dang 'di'o// skyon byed pa gnod pa byed pa rje/ des sdig pa'i las byas par khyed cag gos bsad do// de ltar mi mngon des ji ltar gyur pas rgyas par spras
304b7(mdo): pa dang de rnams kyis yid kyi bdel ba skyes nas spras pa/ drang srong chen po ka la te de lta na des ma lags kyi bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so// zhes de nas de skad du smra bar byed pa na khye'u de gnyis
304b8(mdo): kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i bu lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu 'od rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes
305a1(mdo): gnyis kyis kyang ji lags des byung ba dang bcas pa/ rgyas par smras pa blon po rnams kyis de thos de mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas/ de gnyis las gzhod
305a2(mdo): nu bu bo kas rgyal srid kyi dbang skur pas/ dbang bskur ba las de yang bu myang par shi'o// de nas gcig gos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i phying rgyal po bu ram gang pa zhes bya bar gyur to// ko'u ta ya dag rgyal po bu rab
305a3(mdo): shring pa'i khu dang / tsha bo dang yang cha pa'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgyal yang grong khyer gru 'dzi nad tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tham ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo // ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po
305a4(mdo): bungs shing ba 'ashu dang 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi 'aste/ skar mnga' rtong dang / lakan dang glang po che 'dus dang rkang rngub can no/ dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad
305a5(mdo): nas// de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go// blon po rnams kyi/ sa smras pa/ lha mi'i slad du phyag zhal la gtad de thugs myi dge sa shing bzhugs so// des smras pa nga'i btsun mo dam pa shid ci'i
305a6(mdo): phyir sems khongs su chud cing kyi 'dug/ lhagal te de ltan nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na ci'i sadang lha'i btsun mongs pa gyi bcal rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon du 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dong
305a7(mdo): bas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yodan/ ngal su zhig bu'o ster bar gyurd lha dgongs shig dang bdag gis btsal lo// ji ltar na rgyal po gzhad zhig bu mo/ gzugs bzang ba ltan sdug pa mdzes pa/ sems can
305a8(mdo): rnams la btsun mo dam par btsal ba yod pa de khyi rnams kyis brtags te/ rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs nas / de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu chud de/ rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba khug gis
305b1(mdo): de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug ko// gtam kyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa lha bkra' shis par
305b2(mdo): gyur cig/ dkra' shig par gyu rad cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyod ci'i gesol/ rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pakum nas de'i ched du sras mo spong ngo // rgyal pos
305b3(mdo): smras pa 'thab ri 'bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'dod kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ kal te ra'i bu po la khye'u zhig yod par gyur dad/ dgal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag pa lta na sbyin do// lha bka'
305b4(mdo): bzhin 'tshal mchis lha snyad du 'das par gsol lo/ zhes de nam/ sa dong nas rgyal po bu rab shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur da pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa shes ldan dag ka zhon nu ches u
305b5(mdo): bor gyu ra pa/ rgyal srid la med par dga' ba rnams spangs te 'u bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin do// lha dor 'di la nges pa ya mchis te re shig btsun mo grangs la lha de dang lhan cig rjed po dang dge
305b6(mdo): pa dang / dges dgur spyod pa mdzad cika/ de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'o nad te bu mor 'gyur ram/ s+yai ma mchis par 'gyur su 'tshal rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de ltar ni dpa
305b7(mdo): long shika/ de rnams dong nas bsu' ste// ci tsam na rgyal po'i dpal kyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig che bar byed dga' bar byed dka' mgur spyod par/ 
305b8(mdo): byed do/ de rtse bar byed ka/ 'a yang dka' bar byed/ dka la 'gur 'apyod par byed pas dus gzhan zhigen btsun po sems can dang ldan par gyur te// de zla ba brgyad dpa dku' 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bza pa
306a1(mdo): bstan bsdug pa mdzes pa zhig btsas so// bcas nas de btsas pa'i bcas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i mying cing ka dgas zhes 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa lha 'dir
306a2(mdo): ltar la skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngod par dka' bas de'i srad du khye'u'i khyi po rgyal srid dka' zhes bgyi'o// khye'u rgyas srid dka' lam brgyad la rjes su gtad do/ zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myu rang du bskyed
306a3(mdo): bar byed do/ nes bya ba'i bar gong pa bzhin du'o// de rgyal chab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas des de la po nya btang des/ tshig chub mo dang bcas pa'i spri de yige spring ba khyod kyis sngon
306a4(mdo): kham thangs zhing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed pa dengade ltad legs gas te de spang sa byas ma khyod kyi mthu' dang brtson 'grus rgyal chos kyidapa rol dag dod pa gang yid pa des sdod cig/ mtho 'dar 'i
306a5(mdo): nas yul 'khor bu ram brag go// rgyal po de mthu' chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste/ blon po rnams rdzogs te smras bges ldan dag nga rgyal po des 'di skad ces spang de la ji ltar bsdus par
306a6(mdo): bya/ de rnams kyis sbas pa lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab du dbang ba skur lags yod des spras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phung por gyu rang pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ cu bo rgyal srid kyis
306a7(mdo): dbang skur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no// denapas kyis smras pa/ g+ha rgyal po deni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon gyi 'tshal bar yul bur mar klog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dag
306a8(mdo): rkyal yab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa de dbang bsrur la gzhon nu de rnams ni tsug du gsol rgyal zas ldam pa shes ldan dang spyod byed cing gnod pa la byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar lkug/ lha bdag cag na thon po lags te
306b1(mdo): lha smad par bgyi'i ba lhung len pa legs pas skyed ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis par yang spyugs la/ skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs par bgyid padi bzhog go// rgyal pos btang stobs su bzhag nas cad kyi
306b2(mdo): bar 'dug go// blon po rnams 'tshogs nas phar chud du khros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs gcig pa sham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gnod du rnams la thugs byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes/ phedas
306b3(mdo): de nas kyi bskyed mos tshal du bya dor byas pani ri mo sna tshogs bris par shi nad tu dri zhim po'i phog por nye bar bzhag/ dang gyi chun 'gyed mang po bdags me tog sna tshogs kyis dka' dka' ltar byas pa zhig byed du
306b4(mdo): bcug go// de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal du de byi dor byed brkyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgya ring po nas mthong nas gzhor du rgong
306b5(mdo): bka can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo // blon po rnams bskyed mos tshal de byi dor byed sa sgor byung ba dang gzhon tu rnams kyis dris pa 'di su'i bskyed mos tshal de rnams kyis smras pa la
306b6(mdo): 'i lags so// de rnams slar log par thams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis sbas pa gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig/ ci'i phyir srar ldog/ de rnams kyis smras pa lha'i skyed pos tshal yin/ de 'dir 'jug tu ka la
306b7(mdo): cung zad po rnams kyis smras pa gzhon nu rnams dang du zhugs sheg/ ci'i phyir mar rdzo/ den pas kyis sbas pa lha'i skyed mas tshal yidan/ 'dir 'dug tug sa bzon po rnams kyis smras pa/ 
306b8(mdo): gzhon nun mas rol pa 'di la 'gal ba la mchis te/ de rnams pa kyi ning du zhugs te rtse bar rtsams so/ zor po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa la skyed pam tshal legs par gyi dong ba gyis lags kyis su gzigs
307a1(mdo): pa'i dum sa bgalags pa// rgyal mongs pa dang/ bskyed pos pa la dgu tsa'i rnams so// thos nas kyang thun po rnams la sbas pa/ shes lda de/ brkyen pam tshas dgu mo na grazhan 'di pan/ 
307a2(mdo): 'brug/ thod pa rnams kyis smram pa/ lhag zhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta ra ngas gzhon du rnams spangs so// thod po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras na// su mazad par mdzad cig gzhon du/ 
307a3(mdo): rnanams spang bar gsas/ rgyal pos smras pa de bzhin du bya'o// zhes gzhon nu de rnams sdug par chad pa dang / rgyal ba'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa gas te de kun bdag ga 'khong tu spyi'o// 
307a4(mdo): dang / lhan cig la chi 'ad de 'i nas kyang kyi dgag pa de ltar bka' sa dalang pa'i rigs so// rgyal po'i bsgonas de rnamasachis pa dang / de rnams la dga' ba'i pho zang kyi 'kho rgya m+b+ha spyi bo 'tshogs
307a5(mdo): chen po dang / de rnams lhan cig chas te zhag bdun grong khyer glu 'dzin gi sgo phyi nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer kyi skom bkum na
307a6(mdo): ring ba kyi thogs par gru 'dzid stong par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar na tshad cig de nas gzhon du de rnams rang gi snying mo khrid das mthar dkyis ri bo gangs kyi mi dang / nye 'chu bo skal ldan zhing rta'i 'gras drang srong ser skya'i su
307a7(mdo): gnas dang ha cang yang phyi ring ba zhig tu phyin pas/ de rnams kyis deng lo ma'i skyil bu dag byas te/ gnas btab nas ri dgas pasad cing bsad nas 'tsho ba byed cing dus gsum drang srong ser skya'i sti gnas su 'dong bar byed na
307a8(mdo): lang tsho dang da la bab pa'i dregs pas zind pas 'dod chags kyis shi nad tu nye nad te/ sha bri den pa skya bo seng ser por gyurd to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khye cag ci'i phyir
307b1(mdo): ba dang 'akun ba skyes te/ mas dben kyi zing sa rnams dang ldan she skye bar byed do// dga' bar byed dga' bur spyod bar byed do// dedams dang de dag sud cig ci ba byed/ dadang bar byedadaga' 'thur myong bar byed pad/ 
307b2(mdo): dang bu mo dag bcas te/ de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bas ku tA ga sem pa'i sA yin pas drang srong ser skya'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid bum btu nas shes ldan dag mthong ba kyim kho bag zhan du 'grom/ rlam
307b3(mdo): drong chen po co'i phyir bsam gtan gzims de sme yin pas/ mas rtse gcig tu nyid bum btub pas so// drang srong che po sa 'atub/ da 'di nyid na 'azhug pazhi/ bad can gan sa tshul chil 'odong
307b4(mdo): kyang ma byen sa zhis pang/ zhas pa te lda chung / drang thong bdan nyid chen po de rnam sa de 'du pa bzhin med 'a ba med pasadepa gang kyi bral bum grangs te chu'i rgyud ni grong byer narnam pa// 
307b5(mdo): pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to// surnams kyi rims kyis de nams kyi sems shes das/ phyogs kun da nig bas dang pa dang / de rnams der dang ste/ grong khyer cig shig bcigs nas/ snyam pasnyed de snyam bad
308a1(mdo): ces bya bar gyur to// de nas de rnams 'tshogs shing 'dus nas/ phan tshun gros byas par rnams pa shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyugs pa ni/ rigs mnyan pa las chung ma blangs pa de las gyur de kyis
308a2(mdo): de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chungs blangs par gyi byaste/ gcig kho nas chog zhes par bya'o// de rnams rigs mnyam pa gci khod las chung pa le dang kyi/ chun ya khyi 'i dang to// de ngas dus ka 'ang
308a3(mdo): zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu bsdug pa rnams rjes su dran pa nas / blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag gzhon nu de rnams da ltar kan 'dug de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig las sprugs pa las
308a4(mdo): de rnams rapa rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di das mchis pan/ gangs ri dang nye ba skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i sti gnas dang / ha cang kyi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang gi sring po spangs te mas dpon gyi srang po rnam
308a5(mdo): dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid dka' bar bgyid dka' 'gur myod par bgyid do// de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na bu bo dang bu mo dag bcas so// grong
308a6(mdo): ba dag gzhod nu rnams kyis de ltar byed bod dam/ lhang ro thog lag de nas rgyal po buram zhing pa 'phags skyes pos ro lhod bsrang nas lag gag yas nyas rgya das/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa kyes
308a7(mdo): gzhon nu rnapas ni shi nang tu yod pa yin no// zhes ses can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// nas sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu srung ste/ kye ma ka zhon nu nas ni phod pa yin no// 
308a8(mdo): kye la gzhon nu ni gnad tu phong ba yin no// kye ma gzhon nu ni gning tu yod pa yin do// zhes byas pas de rnams zhag kya shag kya rnams zhes bya bar gyur to/ de nas dus gzhan zhig de rgyal po bu ram dang la 'phags skye ma po
308b1(mdo): shinas rgyas srid dka' rgyal srid la dbang lhung ngo // de yang bu khyed par shi nas skar mda' rtong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go// de yang bu med par shi nas lag na rgyal por gyu ra to// de yang bu byed par shinas/ grang / 
308b2(mdo): po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu myed par shi nas rkang rngu ba can rgyal por gyurd to// de'i bu gnas 'jog go/ ko'u ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bus khyim mo// ko'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa khyim dang kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang
308b3(mdo): yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i kazhi'i byung ste/ de rnams kyi tham no shing rta bcul pa dang / shib rta brkya' ba dang / shing rta dku' bcu' pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal
308b4(mdo): dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang / gzhu' bcu' ba dang / gzhu brgyal pa dang / gzhu'i dgu' bcu' ba dang / kazhu' rgyal dang / gzhu' bkram dang / gzhu' brtan no// ko'u ta ma dag gtu nyul
308b5(mdo): brtan la bu gnyis te seng ge 'gram dang / seng ge smra'o// ko'u ta ma dag 'dzam gling gi gzhu' thogs ji snyed yod pa/ de rnams kyi nang na seng ge 'gram mchog tu grags so// ko'u ta ma dag
308b6(mdo): seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi'i ste/ zas gtsang dang / bas kar dang / bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas so// bu mo gtsang ma dang / kor mo dang / bre mo dang / bdud rtsi ma'o// zas gtsang la bu gan
308b7(mdo): ma ldan 'das ba ci dang ldan pa dga'/ bas ga la cags te/ dang ldan pa rgyas pa dang / sa thobabang ldan mas la thagakyi chen dang / 
308b8(mdo): ldan pa sa 'gags pa'o// bdud rtsi bas kha bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bo dang / lhas sbyin do// gaNang sa'i buni legs pa ra rab tu sad do// dkar mo'i bu 'phreng ba can no// bre mo'i
309a1(mdo): bo ma'i bu ni bzang len no// bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni dge' 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan 'dzin yin te/ ko'u tam dag mang pos bkur ki chung/ rje dang ldan pa sla gan
309a2(mdo): 'dzin tu rdzogs// srid pa'i phreng rgyung chad/ 'khor ba bde de da ni yang srid pa byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rtam rdzogs par mkhyen das bzhengs te bzhug
309a3(mdo): bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsa yang pa/ mo'u 'gal gi bu legs so legs so/ re'u 'gas gi bu chen po khyod kyis dge' slong rnams kyi mdun du sheg kya rnams kyi sdod ka ri
309a4(mdo): rgyud las pa rtsams nas chos kyi rtab spras pa yang legs so// me'u 'gal gi bu yang khyod kyis zhag kya rnams kyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te/ chos kyi rtam rtag tu smos shig dang / dam nad rnams la yun ring po/ 
309a5(mdo): 'don dang phan pa dang bde' bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom/ ldan 'das kyis dka' slong rnams la bka' stsal du pa/ dge'/ srong dag khyed kyis shag kya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsam
309a6(mdo): pa'i chos kyi rtam chongs shig/ zung shig/ lhogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ dge' slong dag shag kya rnams kyi sngon kyi rigs rgyud la tshams pa'i chos kyi rnam ngon dang ldan chos dang ldan
309a7(mdo): pa nas tshangs pa spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge' slong dag rigs rgyud kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shag kya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi rnam bzung shing klag par rigs so// 
309a8(mdo): de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i rigs kyi zhag kya nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dka' ste/ rjes su yi'i banas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi kyirgyan / 
309b1(mdo): nas nga / de'i tshe grong zer mer lha'i gni 'ad rgyal po seng ge'i 'bras zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'dug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo pa phyim bos
309b2(mdo): gang ba 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang rjod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun khyed cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa 'bras dang / pu ram shing gi 'phreng dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun gsum 'tshogs pa
309b3(mdo): na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bsta nang du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid du byed tu bcug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bdel ba dang / 
309b4(mdo): lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang khyi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab padadang / 'thab mo dang / bcod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang markun myed cing dang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ 'bras dang / 
309b5(mdo): bur ba zhing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / me he phun gsum 'tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// rgyal po legs par ba sad kyi btsun mo des pa/ 
309b6(mdo): gzugs bzang po lta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yul gyi bzang mo lum pi ni zhes bya ba yod do// lhas stand khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
309b7(mdo): kyi bu'i rod dang ldan pa na ma thos kyi bu'i dod kyis 'gran pa 'i// gdas pada'i kun dag lang yan me tog sun gsum 'tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phur gsum 'tshogs pa dang / chu phun gsum 'tshogs pa dang / 
309b8(mdo): bya sna tshogs skad 'byin cing / de'i kun dka' ra ba dka' dka' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus nus su btsun po'i 'khor dang lhan gcig tu lhags nas/ den dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do// 
310a1(mdo): lus bi nis de mthong das 'dod pa skyes te des smras pa/ lha kun dka' ra ba 'di bdag la gsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa kun dka' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la
310a2(mdo): kur dka' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir/ de bas lhag par bsang ba zhig bya'o// de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum pi 'i cheng du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dka' ba byed du bcug nas/ de'i phying lum byin la
310a3(mdo): tshal tshal zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal pos sang ge 'gram la yun ring po nas kye la'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los spyar pa skye bar 'gyur kyang mi mdung snyam pa'i blasapa pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs par ra ba sad la yang yun
310a4(mdo): ring po nas kye ma 'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang / lhan cig gnyen du 'gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// ci tsam na dus gzhan zhika na de'i btsun po dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed
310a5(mdo): dka' 'gur spyod pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang lA/ na bar gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyang dam dku' 'das pa na bu mo ka Tu gas bzangs lhan bsdug pa mdzes pa/ yan lag dang
310a6(mdo): nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcas so// bcas pa de'i gzugs bzang bas legs pararab sang btsun po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sa bstad da da gnas pa'i skye bo 'i tshigs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes
310a7(mdo): te the tsom du gyur na sa ci 'di bu mo'o yininapa/ 'dod te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ de'i bcas pa'i bcas ston nyi ma bdud gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i mying ci
310a8(mdo): gdags zhes mying 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa lhas bstan dang gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / sum mdo' dang / bzhi 'amadol rnams su gle na kha cig gi mchid nas
310b1(mdo): ni 'dabu mo khon lags te/ sdod kyims kyi rnam par sbyin par gzugs bzang zhing / kha dog phu gsum 'tshogs par gyur da te zhes patsha'o// gzhan dag ga mchid nas de 'di bu mo lags kyis 'od kyang mi med sam sa
310b2(mdo): tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so// zhes mchi lags pas de bas na su mo myang sgyu 'phrul zhes gtags so// bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do// zhes bya ba das chen mor gyur pa to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
310b3(mdo): bzhin du'o// de la mtshan 'khan rnams kyis lung bstan dpa / mtshan phun gsum 'tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig bca' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khar los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes ston to// yang de'i che rtse bar byed/ dka'
310b4(mdo): 'gur gyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba lta na bsdug pa mdzes pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas par grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ spu 'phrul
310b5(mdo): la ji lta bu bzhin du nga'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad dung byed par myi nus so// de'i btsas pa'i btsam ston ni yang rgya cher bya sa nas/ bu mo 'di'i khyir cing gdags zhes mying 'dogs par byed do// 
310b6(mdo): blon po rnams kyis smras pa / sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bgyi'i bar gdags so// zhes gdags so// de yang bskyed srings nas chen por gyur pa dang / de la mtshan 'khan nas
310b7(mdo): kyis lung bstan dpa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu' cha gnyis dang ldan pa nig bca' bar 'gyur / dede 'khar mas smyung ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// zhes stod to// rgyal ba legs par ra bsad kyis rgyal po seng ge
310b8(mdo): 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ te/ dra la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun gsum 'tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni stobs kyis
311a1(mdo): non yang das // shes sda da na sa kyi'i sanya las rgyan ba
311b1(mdo): zhes mam/ mas rna[]/ des smras pa lhag par zhin tu rdzas kyi rnas
311b2(mdo): 'od kyang gzhon nu dpa pa gcig spong ba ni mnyam pa las rkun pa blangs pa yin no// lha rung gis de bzhin
312a1(mdo): skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i yod/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
312a2(mdo): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon myed zas sbyin gi kun dga' ra ba na dge' slong nyis rgya lnga bcu'i dge' slong gi dge' 'dun cher po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / 
312a3(mdo): gcig pu dben par 'dug pa dang / sems kyis sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes so// stond pa ni bdag gis mngon gsum du gyur dan/ bde' bar gshegs pa chos kyi rje'i gyen sngar bdag so la/ rigs
312a4(mdo): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gang la la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge' slong gi dge' 'dun la rtso pa dang skyabs su song ba'i gang zag pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig sogs par 'gyur ba'i dor de zhu bar bya'o// 
312a5(mdo): snyam du sems te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu phyi 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag par 'jog las langs te// com ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste phyind pa dang / bcom ldan
312a6(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gaHga tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sa/ 'di skad ces gsol to// 
312a7(mdo): btsun pa bdag gcig pu dben par mchis te/ nang du yang dag 'jog la mchis par sems kyis sems kyi cod pa yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ga la
312a8(mdo): la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge' 'dun la skyabs su mchi' ba gang zag de'i bsod napas ci snyed cig tshogs par 'gyur/ skam bgyid lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
312b1(mdo): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa na nga'i bu dang la 'di na ces bka' stsasad to// sha ri'i bu khyod spyi bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang pos 'de' ba dang / 'jig rten la rnying cib dang / skye bo 'itshogs pal ba
312b2(mdo): dang lha dang kyi rnamams pad pa dang / bde' ba'i phyim zhus pa legs so legs so// gang khrod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'ongs te da 'di yongs su zhu bar bsapa pa da/ sha ri'i bu dod 'di nyid
312b3(mdo): rnam par shes pa bya ba'i phyir dpes bstand par bya ste/ skyes bu gang zag zhig rdzu 'phrul gi mthu' 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas/ gang 'di 'dzam bu'i gling dang / nye ba'i gling zheng dang srid du dpag tshad bcun
312b4(mdo): stong yod pa'i 'dzam bu gling de na/ gang srog chags gnas pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du bkod de/ lag 'thil daltar mnyam par byas par rin po che sna bdud la 'di lta ste/ gas
312b5(mdo): da/ dpal dang / kyes kyi dang / gal dang pro tika dmar med pa/ rnam snying po dang / spug rnams las 'dzam bu gli ma mchod rten srid du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bang la thug par dzin
312b6(mdo): mchod rten de la lha'i 'chos dang / lA 'i'i ton dang / lha'i 'phreng ba dang / su'i gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dad rnams kyis mchod pa byas / den sa skyem bu rdzu 'gras kyi
312b7(mdo): dang ldan par gyur pas/ kang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu dge 'jig rted gi khams gzhan du mo ste/ mthu ka'i tis yar gyis rgya mtsho la chen po bzhi'i ltar bkang ba'i nang du snying po ring ba rtsam btsugs la/ skal
312b8(mdo): ba yang po'i mtha' ji srid par ma me'i rgyan gyi 'chad pa nus na shA ri'i bu de ji snyam tu sems skyes bu ga zhi des ma bsod nams yang du 'tshogs snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang lags so// 
313a1(mdo): bde' bar gshegs pa ma nga lags so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bde' bar gshegs pa'i yul lo// bde 'bar
313a2(mdo): gshegs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo// bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge' slong gi dge' 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i
313a3(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po de yang bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma de bas brgya'i char yang nye bar gyi 'gro ste stong gi cha dang brgyal stong gi cha dang grangs dang rgyu dang bgrang bar nye bar myi 'gro'o// denas kyi
313a4(mdo): nams 'di bshad pa'i tshestong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'dzagarten gi khams 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul ldeg
313a5(mdo): rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg ko deng de'i tshe klog gi rgyun che na po byung ngo // lha rnams kyis kyang rnga skags so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// 
313a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i myang ci lagasaji ltar gzung bar bgyi'o bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bskomatha' yas skab pa ces
313a7(mdo): bya bar zung shig de 'a don ni de ltar blta' bar bya ste de de bzhin du zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalang nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang dge' slong gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'a
313a8(mdo): kyis bka' stsal pa la mngod par stod do/ 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i mdol// rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gang gi 'khar pos rba ga nya' de pa dang 'u chen gi lo tsha ba bad de dpal rtsegs
313b1(mdo): kis bsgyur cing rtan la phab pa// / rgya kar skad dunan ta pra bra dz+ya su tra/ bod skad du/ dka' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo'o/ thams cad mkhyend pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
313b2(mdo): zos pa'i dus cig na bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi n+ya kro ta'i kun dka' lan bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dka' bo'i khyim kau lA bA de ra gshegs pa dang / ldum zed bsnams nas phyi bzhon
313b3(mdo): 'brang ba'i dge' slong tshe dpa' ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / ser skya'i kanas su bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang rigs kyi bu dga'
313b4(mdo): bos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du ba dad ba shams nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
313b5(mdo): 'das tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das ba dan pa shes pa la bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan
313b6(mdo): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dka' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo ci'i phyir rab tu myi 'byung / 
313b7(mdo): dka' bos gsold pa bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'tshig gi don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal pa sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
313b8(mdo): ka ti' yug dag rab tu sel pa yin no// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang 'tshang 'brul ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sku dpa g.yo'i 'i mun pas bsdus pa'i tri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin no// lo tog thams
314a1(mdo): cad kyis gzhi'i lta bur yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi'i yin do// rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas/ yin no// bde' ba thams cad kyi yid bzhin ga nor bu yin no// yon tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin no// 
314a2(mdo): sems cad thams cad dbugs 'byind pa yin no// 'byung po thams cad yid brtan pa yin no// srog chags thams cad la myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin no// sems can dbul po thams cad kyi bum pa yin no// skyabs myed pa rnams kyi dpung
314a3(mdo): gnyen yin no// kun tu tshol bas 'phongs pa dang bsdug bsngal gyis nyams zag pa rnams kyi bstim yinan// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba/ yin no// mkhas pa rnams kyis
314a4(mdo): bsngags pa yin no// thar par 'gro ba rnams kyi lam yin no// sems can dag pa rnams kyi sten par rgyan pa'o// snod du gyur pa rnams kyis bsten par bya ba yin no// ngan song gi sgo gcod pa yin no// mtho laris dang
314a5(mdo): tha rad pa'i sgo 'byed pa yod do// swa'i 'gro ba rnams 'gengs pa yi na'o/ sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa yin no// bsred pa'i bcing bas bcings pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga'
314a6(mdo): bde ni rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i khyim yin do// rang pa'i yang dag par sdom pa yin do// kye ngan las 'das pa la skyen pa byen nortog tu danye bar gcod pa yin no// rten mongs pa byeg pa yin no/ 'byo
314a7(mdo): rnams 'byid pa yidan do// su ba da pa'i dra brnamapa 'jig par byed pa yin no// bcud kyi tshul mtshan rgol ba yin do// bzod pa sgrub bsgreng ba yid do// 'khong ba'i mthong po ldog par byed pa med do// chos kyi 'khor sa stsus
314a8(mdo): byed pa yid no// mu rdo'im tsho'i snyoms pa yid do// num pa'i 'jig par byed pa mid do// skye ba dang / da ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' yin do// phung po'i khur 'jog pa yid do// nyon mongs pa'i 'angs du bya ba rnam pa
314b1(mdo): zugs kyi khams las yang dgra par rgal bar byed pa yin// 
314b2(mdo): 'byind pa yin no// khyim ge gseb du bcangs pa rnams rnam par krol bar byed pa yin no// gnod pa 'tshor ba rnam zad par byed pa yin no// the tsom rnams dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma brtan por gyur pa rdas gcod pa yin no// rga shis 'jigs
314b3(mdo): pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no// bsdug bsngal bral ba zad par byed pa yin no// 'khor ba'i bsdug bsngal gis gtses pa rnams kyi bdel ba dang khyi 'dzegs pa'i 'gran yin no// 'dod pa'i khams las rgal bar byed pa yin
314b4(mdo): no// gzugs kyi khams las rnam par gal bar byed pa yin no// don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa mchog thob pa yin no// dga' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi myig lta bu
314b5(mdo): yin no// ga ti'i mug gi mun pa'i smon ma yin no// rgyud dag pa ra byed pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byad pa yin no/ lam stor ba rnams la lam ku na tu ston pa yin no// 
314b6(mdo): chos thams cad kyi de kho na yin do stond pa yin do// bdud pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed pa yin no// ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba yid do/ myi shes pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa
314b7(mdo): rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no// le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la tsam par byed pa yid do// tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa la mdo// tshul khrims phun gsum 'tshogs pa rnabs rab tu dka'
314b8(mdo): bar byed pa yin no// brtson 'grus phams pa rnams mchog tu dka' ba yin no// nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dka' ba yin no// rnal 'byor nga pyod pa rnams mchog tu chog par byed pa yor
314b9(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i dgra' 'joms par byed pa yin do// rnams kyi mchom ma yin do// phyir gyi 'ong ba rnams mchog tu phyal bar byed pa yin do// gnas myed pa rnams kyi gnal yin/ skyob pa byed pa rnams
315a1(mdo): kyi skyob pa yin no// 'jigs pas 'breld pa rnams kyi phyi 'jigs par byed pa yin no// skyabs myed pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no// bsdug bsngal rnams kyi bde' pa'i yo byad yin no// 'khor ba
315a2(mdo): 'ibacing bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin no// dka' bo de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o// lha dang myi rnams kyi 'thang gi rgya la yin no// kyi 'i dbang po rnams kyis mchod pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
315a3(mdo): dgongs pa yin no// khyim pa'i gnas yongs su rtod pa yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam 'dren pa yin no// skra'i khur 'dreg pa yin no// gos ngur smyig ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin do// 
315a4(mdo): rigs pa la brtson pa brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no// 'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin no// bdud sdig can rnams kyi dregs pa yin 'joms pa yin no// lha dpa rtse rnams rab du da
315a5(mdo): pa yin te/ dga' bo rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na/ 'i phyir rab tu myi 'byung / dka' bo rab tu byung ba ni 'khor los smra ra ba ni rgyal srid ni bde' ba las kyang ches khyad par du 'phags par ba
315a6(mdo): ba yin na// dga' bo gzhan yang dal ba 'tshogs pa ni bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang shind tu rnyed par rga ba yin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyes par dka' ba yin no// dga' bo tha rad pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po drang srong
315a7(mdo): rnams dang / gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa rnams kyang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa sa bor nas rab tu byung ngo // de bzhin du khyim bdag dang bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang
315a8(mdo): khyim rnams par nas rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol da to// btsun pa bdag ni khyim par mchis la sbyin pa dag cha lang bsod nams dag bkye' zhing / bcom ldan
315b1(mdo): 'das nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bgyi'i zhing chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims mdang / snyun ki gos smad dang / yo byad rnams kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das khyim
315b2(mdo): bka' stsal da pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khams gsum pa gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar 'gyur la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la las
315b3(mdo): lo brgyar 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stand dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ dga' bo de rab tu byung bar nges par 'byung ba'i sems kyi bcu
315b4(mdo): drug gi char yang myi phod do// dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // dal ba shi nad tu rnyed dka' ste// dka' bo stond pa mngon gyurd pa// nga la myi mnyes ma byed cig/ dka' bo dper na sa chen po 'di chu gcig pu ra n+ya
315b5(mdo): mtshor gyur la de na rus sbal zhar ba cig kyang yod/ de na gnya'ashing gi bu gcig pa cig kyang rgyu la ru spal zhar ba de 'di skad du gnya' shing gi pu ka der mgrin par bcug par bya'o// snyam du
315b6(mdo): sems skye zhing / gnya' shing gi bu ga can de yang rlung gis bskyo de nas phyogs phyogs su rgyug par byed pa na/ dga' bo brgya' la rkye nad zhig gis nu sbal zhar ba de'i 'grin pa gnya' shing gi bu ka der
315b7(mdo): 'grin pa bcug par byan/ dka' bo bya nyid thob pa rnam yod do// dam pa phun gsum 'tshogs pa yang rnyed na dga' bo khyod kyis bya nyid shinang tu rnyed par dka' ba dang / de bzhin tshungs baphud gsum 'tshog
315b8(mdo): pa yang rnyed da/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // das pa gning tu rnyed dga' rnyed// dga' bo sto dang pa mngon gyur dpa / ngal gyi mnyes ma byed cig// dpe par 'ga' zhig gis khab kyi myig gan bcu star te
316a1(mdo): nyungs kar gi 'phrul rnams 'thor bar byed/ dga' bo brgyal la rkyen zhig deng nyungs kar gi 'bru gang yin pa gcig chud par 'gyur gi/ dga' bo mya rnyed pa ni ma yin no// dal ba phun gsum 'tshogs
316a2(mdo): pa yang de bzhin no// dga' bo mo nyid shinang tu rnyed par dka' ba dang // de bzhin du dal ba phun gsum 'tshogs pa yang rnyed na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung / dal ba shind tu rnyed dka' rnyed// dka' bo ston
316a3(mdo): dam pa mngon gyur pa// dul gyi mnyes ma byed cig// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skal pa bye ba stong dpa de// brgyal dang khrag khrig dag tu yang // sangs rgyas sman gyi zas sa// na// sangs rgyas mthong
316a4(mdo): ka la zhig/ mu dum par 'i me tog ni// shing las gan tu rnyed ka la ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste// khyed kyis bdi rnyed 'gyur na// dka' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung // ngas pazhid
316a5(mdo): tu rnyed dka' ste// dka' bo stond pa mngon gyur dpa// ngal gyi mnyes ma byed cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo kha spu bregs te/ gos rung sbyig bgos te// rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par
316a6(mdo): dad pa/ kho nas khyim byed par rab tu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdaces bka' stsal dbadang / tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo dang/ rigs kyi budaga' tho / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
316a7(mdo): dka' bor tu byung ba'i mdo / na nas dang/ dun tugs rtad
316a8(mdo): bathams cad mkhyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa nas dgang 'grags 'o// dgongs nas shes dang / cung bu dang / dngus dang / kurba ta dang zhing po dang / zla ba'i 'ad bar dang / snod kyi
316b1(mdo): nam mkha' dang / pad pa'i rtsa lag ltar dri ma myed par mdzod la/ rlung gi stobs kyis shing lcug phran bskyod pa dang / skyeko rgyu dang / snum dang / myi la ma dang / klog dang / rta'i shing rta 'i dz+wa la dang / ba la glang
316b2(mdo): gi phyag gu'i namachog dang / sbrul gi lce dang / zil pa dang / rgya mtsho'i spyod pa'i rlabs ltang g.yo' ba'i yod skad cig re re la yang kyi sdod par 'gro' ba rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzid kyi stobs kyis yud tsam cig rtsub
316b3(mdo): nang du dgag tsug pos smras pa/ rig par 'bab pa'i dpal rlabs gyu rang pas kyang // dpa' drabs 'gyur ba skrur byed par// 'jig pa thogs kyid ga yo ba'i yid de re// yud tsab rtse gcig mdzod cig bcun
316b4(mdo): ba rnams/ lha'i bu mo yi che dbugs byung skad cig gi phyir byas pa'i rtsig/ ring zhing gzeng ldan bka' lha 'di 'tshor gyig chags su bka yo ba yis// gang gis thugs ni skye ba rkun gcod sru las
316b5(mdo): 'khrugs par ma gyur pa/ bdud kyang 'joms mkhas gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa de la phyag mdzod cig// skye ldan gang du brten nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems dumyal bzhi la dang // yi
316b6(mdo): dgas 'jig rten gnas su 'gro bar gyi 'gyur ba sdug bsngal 'jig byed pa// 'khor ba dag na 'gro ba chen po rnams kyi grogs gyurang 'phags gcig po// zhi bde 'grong khyer skor gzhol de la shi nad tu gos pas bste nad par mdzod// 
316b7(mdo): zhi ba'i bdag nyid gang zhig bde' gshegs par gsung rab mthard kyi ded 'byung smra zhing // gang la gus par cung zad tsam zhig byi nad pa 'phel gyur nga la// ye shes snang bas mun pa zad byas dge' slong dka' 'dun de la ni nyon mongs
316b8(mdo): gcod pa'i ched du thams cad kyis kyang gug par phyag mdzod cig// srung lo chun po skra mang bgol la thogs shing dpung 'go' gnyis g.yog la// rang gi 'od zer phyogs mthar 'phro ba rnams kyis 'jig rte nad kun 'gengs pa/ lha dbang
317a1(mdo): brgyal byin cod pan bdud de tshangs pa phyag byas gang yin te/ byin das dga' byas sems kyi ting 'dzid chen po'i 'bras bu yin/ rdo rje 'ong 'phro'o 'phreng bas dpung rgyan 'dres nas mdzes gyur
317a2(mdo): cing // lha la bka' stso lang dbang po mtho' ris skyong ba gang yin pa// de dag dge' ba dag 'byung nam sbyind 'gyur dus nyams dka' zhing // mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun gsum 'tshogs pa'i rgyu rnams yin/ kha zas
317a3(mdo): rgyags 'gyur dri zhim 'byung zhing myig gi mtha' mar la// dbugs 'byung do shal g.yos pas nu ma 'bur la 'drud byed pa// bstug dgu'i lhan cig nor bdag 'ga' tshal 'dug pa gang yin pa// de yang 'gro ba nyams dka' sbyin pa/ 
317a4(mdo): 'i bdag nyid chen po yin// 'brug sma sgrog cing sprin rnams chu ni kun tu lend byed pa// brlabs 'byung dus na nor bu byi na cung dang 'phyim 'byung // rin can gnas ni tshus nyid kyi 'byod pas gang bsrung
317a5(mdo): der yang spya ni sbyin pas mchog cing thub pas bka' stsal to// nga yang 'od bar rnams kyis ba'a' la skang ma'i 'khang kha zol yin/ cing / ku mung 'ardzing yangs rnams su dpas na rab tun pa byed pa
317a6(mdo): bla ba che'i mtsha' ba'i dpas dang ldad 'ing mtshan mog ning tu rab 'dzes pa// de yang nges par sbyin pa nyid kyi 'bras bur gro mang po me/ ri ba rtse la kong rnamal ma 'a 'dug pa'i di cin docig gi// rta'i galag nams
317a7(mdo): dbul tshigs bo brlabs ni gcod byed pa// mun pa bsal phyi nyims garas thil man lam la gang yin pa// de du med kyis ting nge 'dzidzid kyis babyed pa'i spyon par thub pas gsus// rgyas ma chan cing btanas
317a8(mdo): rin chen 'od ser snang bas nam mkha' dbar gyur cing // ta myig 'dod pas mkha' la srid gi 'greng ba dag kyang 'drel byed la/ lab dkar pos g.yangs zhing 'khor las skur ba song ba shang yin pa// 'dod pa'i 'das
317b1(mdo): bu de yang sbyin pas bsgrubs shes thub pas bka' stsal to// ka ser gi pad ma'i rdul gi phye las dmar bris mtsho 'i khrus byas te// de'i nags 'dab bung ba spa 'byind rnams su nyal ba'i bde'i rnyed nas// rigs 'dzin
317b2(mdo): chung ma lhan cig 'jigs byed mkha' las 'grol ba gang yin pa// de yang 'jil zhing skyon myed dga' ba'i sbyin pa 'ge ba'i brjid yin// ma la ya'i ro ci can dang grib mas bsil bas yangs pa dang / 'byigs khyed
317b3(mdo): dang gangs dang lhun po'i ri ding man da ra'i ri bo la// grub pa'i tsho gas chen chung ma lhan cig 'jigs la dga' ba gang yin pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu che 'di'i snying po 'byor pa de yang gtong ba yin// bud myed rkang gdub 'khrul
317b4(mdo): bas 'drogs nas 'phur ba'i phug ron gnas pa yin// khang pa 'thon na po rnams dang 'bigs byed ri rtse 'gron pa'i bA lang dang gdugs dang bud byed g.yog 'khor rin cen gser dang rta rnams dang
317b5(mdo): bzang mdzes de dag kun kyang sngon gi sbyin pa'i dge' pa'i rnam sbyin yin/ ban du ka ltar rtsa dmar rgun chad gsor snod bzang por legs blugs pa// yongs dag a mri sbyin ltar dri zhim ud pal 'byang zhing lde maH
317b6(mdo): na chung zhin pa mna' sgog dus kyis stobs shing yams drangs mang 'drim pa/ mchog tu dge' ba de rgyu sbyin pa yin zhes blo gros dag pas gsungs// gser gi phag skas rkeng bcings snyan smra 'dzum zhing sbyin ma ya cig bskyod/ 
317b7(mdo): myig yangs na gdub dkar dag 'byes la sgra bgab me tog 'phreng bkris pa'i// na chungs bzang mo brla'i rgyas bdag nyid legs byas rnams kyi bren ltar byed// tshogs brtsegs 'bras de sbyin pa'i che ba nyid ces zas gtsang sras bos
317b8(mdo): gsungs// de lta lags pas bde' bar gshegs pasa'i gsung rab mtha' dag thugs chud pa// shi nad tu rgyas pa'i chu ltar gyurd pa snying dri ma myed pa dang // lha'i skye bo dang klu'i gnas su gyur pa// tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin/ 
318a1(mdo): zhing skyes pa'i chu dang ldan pa dge' ba larnam par rtog pa'i zla bzhar ba'i dbang gis/ ting nge 'dzind sna tshogs rgyas pa'i dus kyi rlabs kyis// byang chub kyi yan lag skyon byed pa'i nor bu mang po kun tu g.yengs
318a2(mdo): ba// sems kyi 'og gzhim sa 'phags pa'i sam yan lag gno sa brkyang ba'i ri'i chen po brtan dag/ 'bras bu'i bye brag thob pa/ gang thog chen po 'dri srin chub// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / yang dag par
318a3(mdo): spong ba dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngogs dang ldan pa / sgrib pa 'iro byi gnas pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan goms pa dag pa'i mu te/ ga nyi phyis kyi khog lus
318a4(mdo): dang ldan pa// mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid gting kyi daphyogs shing dezab pa// rgyun gyi 'chad par klog pa dang / kha tor byed pa'i hA dmya cher 'byung ba dang // 'phags pa'i dge' slong gi dge' 'dun
318a5(mdo): ki rgya mtshal chen po la bdag gsol ba 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste srid pa'i 'i 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu drud pa du ma nas dge' ba'i sa bon btab ba// bde' bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa gzhal myed khang gis
318a6(mdo): she ga pa byasa'abod pa sa pa sa gad / nad gaganag da ca
318a7(mdo): bas rnams pas/ dran pa nye bdag da dad pa na ma mamangamam mna' dza ba'i tshong dang lda pa skyetho bams bzhed 'dung byed padang / na dum 'dang / 
318a8(mdo): phyag 'bas pasas thogs pa'i tshul babang po dang ldan ni babang dran pas mams gan pa rnams pa skyed ba/ ston dag tha banya ba'i 'od ba dag pa lta bu'i yid 'byung ba// sbyi bdag chen po 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid dun gying 'di zhes bya ba' 'di/ 
318b1(mdo): khyim bdag legs sbyin dang / bzang ldan dang btsun po 'khor gyi pra dang mu ga la dang / tra pu sa dang / ko sha le dang pa/ sta bkor ni ka dang / mgon khyed zas sbyin dang / drag po dang / nag po dang / nas klu las stsogs pa dang
318b2(mdo): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la yid mngon par dad pa dang / gsal rgyal dang tshangs pas sbyin dang / rgyal po sha rad pa'i bu dang / gtum po rab snang las stsogs pa sa'i steng la dbang ba'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i legs pa brjod pa'i rjes
318b3(mdo): su slob ste/ lus dang longs spyod dang srog la/ sgyu ma dang smyig rgyu dang / dri za dpa'i grong khyer dang / 'gal me skor dang / rmi lam dang / ri'i 'bab chu'i chu ltar g.yo' bar rig nas stobs bcu la mnga' bas gsungs
318b4(mdo): pas tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos mngon pa dang / 'dul ba dang mdo'i sde 'dzi nad cing / dge' ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smyind pa yod do// zhes bsod nams kyi sa bon bskyed pa'i rgyu 'khor ba'i dge' ba phun su
318b5(mdo): 'tshogs pa zhig/ skye bo ngan pas rnyed par dka' ba ser sna can gi yid 'jom pa bsgrub pa nastond kyi zla ba tri ma myed pa ltar da nga ba'i thugs mnga' ba// srid pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gcod
318b6(mdo): pa// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyend pa grags pa 'i 'jig rten gsum du khyab pa// bdud kyi bu mo steg pa rgyun gcod rgyun ka cod pa'i rgyu// skyabs su 'os pa chos stond pa 'gro' ba la
318b7(mdo): dge' ba'i bya dka' ba'i 'phrin las rnams kyis chos thugs su chud pas/ rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od zer ki/ snang ba gsald pas re ga nas pad pa'i 'da' ma rgyas pa ltar ring zhing rdzi ma lags pa'i spyan dang ldan
318b8(mdo): pa/ gnod sbyin gi bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu chen pos zhabs kyi so rad mo ku nad tu bskor pa/ gser gi mchod sdong ltar gsal ba/ sku la rdo rje dang lugs 'akyu dang / pad ma dang nya dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs
319a1(mdo): dang 'khor lo las stsogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyi mtshan mnga' ba/ pad ma'i 'byung gnas rnams la snang mdzad kyi 'od kyi 'phreng ba bye brag myed par khyab par rgyas par 'gengs pa bung ba'i tshogs ltar
319a2(mdo): ma ltar sngo ba'i tsug tong gning nas kun tu 'byung ba'i 'od kyi dra bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la lus par byas pa/ khad ma tho ba byed par zhugs pa / 'phags pa'i bden pa ston pa zhi bar gzhol ba'i las
319a3(mdo): 'dren pa 'jig rten bsgrol pa mnyes gshin pa gnyen gcig pu mu stegs can ngan pa'i sgrol ba rnams kyis gsung dang thugs dang dpa' ba dang mthu' la myi gnod pa ka tsad ma'i sras// yul rnams kun la sred pa
319a4(mdo): 'byung ba rgyun skabs 'byed pa'i rgyu// skye bo mkhas pa rnams ni sad par bya phyin shar dgyu rad pa// bag la nyal gi rab rib sel ba ye shes snang ba'i mchog/ sa rnams mtha' dag snang ba phyogs rnams thams cad snang mdzad pa
319a5(mdo): phyag dang zhabs dang dpung ni rab tu byin zhing tshul khrims dang / smod la te dag gis byang chub lam bzang yang dag bsgrubs kyurd pa// sri/ da par 'gro bar dug gis snye ma'i steng du ltung ba'i skye dgu'i rnas la khan ma tho
319a6(mdo): ba myed par ston mdzad pa/ sred pa rnam pa gsum 'jig pa/ bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa myi 'jigs par zhil mnga' ba/ dpa' ba dang / mthu' kha na ma tho ba myed pa/ mahA/ 
319a7(mdo): dang dpe' byad bzang pos brgyad pas sku brjid pa pha rolapa tu phyind pa drug dang dka' ba brgya' phrag du mas dam pa'i chos dkon mchog sgrub pa/ baN+Da la pa tsam gyis sems can mtha' dag gis bas pa thugs su chud pa/ 
319a8(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun rab tu zhi ba dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / bzod pa dang / byas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs
319b1(mdo): pa'i ra ba rib dngaling tog ma lus par swa lad pa/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rig pa dang / phyogs kyi gtsug lag khang dang kun dga' ra ba dang / ri dang nags 'dab dang / khrad khrod dang / chu dang ri sul dang / gsher
319b2(mdo): sa dang de'u sing dang shing kyi grib ma rnam pa sna tshogs la dgyes pa yul dang / ljongs du ma la phan gdags par rtsol ba mdzad pa/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / dga' ba thob pa las mnyes pa
319b3(mdo): phung po lnga sprir skad gcig par yang dag par so sor rtog pa'i yod la byed pa bskyed pa/ mdo'i sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa dang / skyes nga pa'i rabs dang / gleng gzhi'i dang / tshogs su bcad pa dang // rtogs
319b4(mdo): pa brjod pa dang da lta bu dang byung ba dang gtan la phab pa rig/ natam kyis sems sbyangs pa rang gyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi'o drug pa dran pa nye bar gnas par chub dbang po dang stobs dang / byang / 
319b5(mdo): chub kyi yan lag dang bden pa dang // 'phags pa'i lam dang / tran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa goms pas dad pa thob pa bu mo phrugs kyis nyams dga' la ri sul mthon po dpag bsams nags yang dang
319b6(mdo): ri bag pa rnams na gang dag bzhugs pa dang // shing gi me tog 'brul pas dri zhim byas pa'i ser bu dad ldang zhing // nags na glang po 'dreg pa zag pas skoms pa'i rin cen 'khri shing khyim/ khyim la chags pa myed pa'i
319b7(mdo): yis bstend pa'i bso das chu gling gi gnya' shing 'dzin khri bye rgyags khru gnas pa na gang dag bzhugs pa dang / bal mos bsnyoms sdod pa'i drug 'gyur 'tshal/ me tog ldan zhing ser 'u dang ldang ba/ sa h+ya tho
319b8(mdo): ngos ni yangs pa la/ yongs dag thugs mnga' thub pa bzhugs dgu' dang / pad ma mud pa la rgyas 'byung ba'i gnas/ nyen re nyi ma'i shing rtas rdo snad can/ srid pa'i 'jigs bral rab tu yid 'ong ba/ 'a
320a1(mdo): ba'i ri stengs gang dag bzhugs pa dang / ri'i rtse mos sngo bsangs sprin thal sman ldong can// ngogs ldan chu bo man da ras no ri sul bkrus// glang po'i mche' bas snyogs pas sa phyogs grogs pa'i ri/ 
320a2(mdo): 'byigs byed rma bya rgyags gnas pa na bzhugs dku' dang // sna tshogs 'byung kun tshon kyi kha sbyar phug dang ldan zhing sprin kyang chags gyur da la// ko blags ldan pa gtsang ma'i chu yis rogs kyi rdo mang pos bkrus 'gyur
320a3(mdo): cing // ngos la ba lang 'jug ma mang po 'phyar zhing glos 'grus snang byas pa// yongs 'dus ri rtse phrag na gcig pu sred dang bral ba gang dag bzhugs pa dang // gang dag shing dang khri shi na pa mang po 'dab
320a4(mdo): chags par gnas pa// ne'u sing 'dzal sngo ba'i steng nam bya'i khru gar byed cing sgra snyand pa 'byin pa// ri dgas kyi tshogs bag yangs su gnas pa'i sos bcad pa ca'i myug
320a5(mdo): gu yod pa me tog ki dri zhim pos bgos pa'i ser bu 'dzani bsil ba'i ngad ldang ba'i nags 'dab rnams su gnas pas te/ bzhugs pa rnaMs dang / yang gang dag dus su brlab
320a6(mdo): 'byung po'i chu 'i dpa' ru bas kyis g.yengs pa zhin le zham dang / li shaM dang la po la'i 'bras bu sngon po mang po 'u khrigs pa'i tshan dang a ga ra'i khrod na gnas pa'i sbrul 'go'i gdangs ka gdengs shing 'jigs su rung ba yod pa/ 
320a7(mdo): glang sro tri kas pa dang bcas pa'i snas byur ru'i sdong bu bsgyeld pa dang ldan zhing / nyi ma'i 'od zer gis reg pa'i dbang gis mu tig yod pa'i nya phyis kha bye ba'i thog mas rnam par spras pa nye bar 'dul ba dang ldan la// nor
320a8(mdo): bu mchog gi rdo la grub pa'i chung ma'i spyi bo gnas shing bya'i khru dka' ste/ sgra 'byin pas klu len pa lta bu yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i gling dag na// klu'i bdag po'i lus chen pos bsku bkris te// gdengs ka'i gdugs kis
320b1(mdo): nyi ma'i 'od zer bsgrims shing bsam gtan mdzad pa rnams dang // sman ldong dka phyogs kyi glang chen drang gis do ba khyabs pa'i khru 'khod cing // 'khor bcas lhan cig ma yin ra ro ba'i gnod sbyin mo dag gnas gyur da la/ 
320b2(mdo): klu'i rgyal po 'go bo stod de kha nas 'od 'bar byung bas shing bsreg cing // gangs ri to si la ni bro gtsang gang dag zhal ton mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang // rgya mtsho la rlabs kyis bshal ba'i ri begab ldan pa ma smad pa// 
320b3(mdo): ri bo man da ra lo nyan phyed tshun chad bzhugs bzhugs shing // nyi ma phye bar gyur nas kar dag/ bzhugs pa'i phyir// dor bus rtse mo bkra ba 'khor yug ri la bste nad pa dang // kang dka' khri shing gzhon nu se rdo pa
320b4(mdo): khyebs kyu rad pa'i// dbang chen rtse mo nyid du 'ong bar bder gan sa te// mkha' lding shugs kyi nang du klu rnams krugs pa yin/ rgya mtsho' rin cen gnas la rnam par gzigs pa dang // ngang pa'i cho ga
320b5(mdo): can shi nad tu gtsang ba drag 'bab 'chang gi chu yis ri bkab bkrus gyur cing // phyogs kyi glang pos bkye lang pa'i sa la gyi yis rdo ba chen po mang po khyabs kyurd la// gcan zan dbang po ral
320b6(mdo): pa 'khyi lad cing kasal pas dpung pa'i phyogs 'bar nyal bas dgar gyurd cing // sbal myig 'thon pa 'i lcug mas 'khor ba grub pa ngal sos ri bo kron dza gang gshegs dang // gang dag mun phral khyad par can gi blo ma la
320b7(mdo): ba shing ljon sna tshogs me tog rgyas gyur cing // ri dgas rgyu bas ne'u sing gzhon sman pa// gzi'i rno nags rnams myi spong bzhugs pa dang / yang gang dag nub kye ba lang khyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang gi
320b8(mdo): skra myi snyan dang / gling gzhan dag na skyes pa'i lcug phran mdog snam zhing sngo la 'jam pa mang pos sa gzhi'i kun tu khyebs pa// shing gi grib ma'i dkyil 'khor bsil ba dang / khri shing gis 'khor cing / ri dgas mang pos gnas
321a1(mdo): pa'i nags tshal de dang de dag na bzhugs pa rnams dang / yang gang dag dar dang kan dar dang gu zan da li dang shi ring da dang / paka le dang / bri shi dang / kha che yul dang / rgyal yul dang / grong lder
321a2(mdo): zas 'dra dang / rdo 'jog zas 'dra dang / skyes pa'i grong khyer dang / phyogs 'tshams dang / kun ti ma la ba dang / srung byed dang / grong khyer dang / tsha thu ka dang / tsha ta dang b+ha ru kad tsha dang / ko'u sha phyi dang / 
321a3(mdo): ser skya'i gnas dang / gnyan yod dang / myi thub pa dang / grong khyer me tog dang / tir dang / bcom parlag dang / grong khyer long bapyod dang / tsam pa ka dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / dbang po'i brag phug dang
321a4(mdo): 'brog dang / ko ma'i grong dang / kun dka'i grong dang / mchod rten gyi klong dang / 'khrur bcug gi grong dang / rnam par rgyal ba'igrong dang / yangs pa dang la khi ra shing 'phel ba dang / 'phel khyed
321a5(mdo): dang / zangs kyis g.yogs pa dang / sde rnyogs 'dzi nad dang / ko sa la dang / an 'dra dang / ma ling ka dang / ba ra bar dang nas gling dang / sing nga la'i gling dang / ka la ga'i grong khyer dang / 
321a6(mdo): gser ki sa dang / ha ri ka la dang / be ro sha ka ta ha dang / na li kai ra dang / phan sa'i gling dang / shur pa dang / nim pa'i grong khyer dang / dpal kyi zhing dang / dungu la chu ba'i gnas las stsogs pa/ yul dang cha byad dang / 
321a7(mdo): skad dang / gnas pa dang / cho ga dang / rigs pa dang / rus dang / tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims can du gzhi'i yul/ myi gnas pa'i yul gzhan dag na bzhugs pa rnas dang // gang dag sngon \u0f7fda nyi zla'i 'od kyis ma pho/ 
321a8(mdo): cing // sheg sbrul gyi lus kyi 'obs gnas ri'i drung // de'i gtsug gi de cen 'od kyis yun bsal pa'i// sa 'og tu ni ring po gyi sogs gshegs kyurang dang / gang dag chu ltar sa la thogs byed byi'u thul mdzad pa dang
321b1(mdo): kang dag sar gnas phyag gi rtse mos zla ba reg mdzad dang // gang dag bya ltar dam mkha' la ni shugs kyis rgyu mdzad cing // nam bza'i tha mas sprin mthar reg pas spro ni ling 'jig mdzad dang // gang dag lha dang grub pa dang / 
321b2(mdo): 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa'i ro 'jigs myed dang / bung ba'i ri dang / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel dang / sha rad kyi ri bo dang / nub kyi ri 'o dang / shi ri kun da pa ta dang / kun da so ma dang / ta ma sa 'tshil
321b3(mdo): dang bsil tshal dang / lhas sprul dang / 'jigs myed ri dang / nags tshal chen po dang / tsher ma can gi nags tshal dang / byams pa'i ri dang / chu srin byis pa bsod kyi ri dang / ri nag po dang / gnas kyi ri
321b4(mdo): dang / ser skya'i ri dang ma rtog gau dang / tsan dang ki ri dang klu'i ri bo dang / tsan dan kyor po dang / tsher ma'i ri bo dang / yul babs dang / a pa sim b+ha dang / kun dga' stong ldan dang
321b5(mdo): ri bo 'argyal mtshan dang / zhi bkrus dang / rang gis mchod rten dang / sa lu spungs pa la tshe rabs gzhan dang gzhan na brtsams pa'i dge' ba'i rnam par spyon pas grub pa/ ji ltar grub pa 'byor par
321b6(mdo): nus pa dang mthun pa'i rtsom pas tshogs brtsegs pa/ phan yon lnga'i chu sems can thams cad gnas par byed pa/ 'jig rten pha rol bde' ba thob par byed pa/ kha dog dang tri dang / ro dpe reg pa dang ldan pa
321b7(mdo): yid du 'ong ba/ gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / gdub pa dang / bzhi'i pa las stsogs pa zhal zas bsham par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhal zas khyad par can gyis s+yan 'dren no// 
321b8(mdo): de la thog yar bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe// gang dag ye shes kyi mes nyon mongs pa'i shing thams cad pa lus par bsregs pa/ gtong ba'i ngang tshul can ni sbyin pa'i sa bon// 
322a1(mdo): 'khad pa'i man dar pa 'arjing gi chu dang ldan zhing yal gagasas pa'i snying/ rin pa che me tog gi 'phreng ba bres pa 'ashing yongs su 'das kyis kun tu mdzes par byas pa'i lhun po 'bab pa'i sa gzhi las 'khod pa rnam pa dang / 
322a2(mdo): yang na gang dag/ gser ri nyi das bsol pa'i chu 'bab la/ tshul zla ba'i gzugs rten kyar gyur cing // zla ba'i 'od kyis kuwa kha bye ste// ku mud tshal na skad snyan dang pade'i gnas/ da
322a3(mdo): mtshe' lun sA snyad pa 'byind// mtsho ngogs ma bya dkar bcas rgyags pa gnas/ ma bya rgyags spras ri sul snyan pa grag/ ri sul ya la ka klags pas ri che 'khrigs// ri rtse stong rnams na ni sprin chags

322b1(mdo): rtsig pas rdo bcag cing // myi 'am ma'i ldan dang pho brang 'khor dpal yod can dang // bya rgod kyi phung po dang / ri dgas kyi kun sa dang / ka sho da dang / gtsug lag khang dang / sang ka rdo
322b2(mdo): ka sha hi las stsogs pa cho 'phrul chad du byung ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams dngo/ dang mar dzi ka'i mchod rten du ma dang sangs rgyas gzhi'i bdan khri yod pa bsod nams su gyu rang pa'i sa phyogs rgyun gyi 'chad par klog pa dang
322b3(mdo): dang / sagatad ting nge 'dzidzin rnams par zhugs pa dang / tshul bzhin du mi sa byed pas 'dug pa dag pas dpa' bco tharnams 'azhugs 'thugs pa/ mags dang / bas sa
323a1(mdo): zhabs kyis bcags pas gtsang bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi lanan// zhi ba thub pa'i skye bo gnas pa rnams na/ de kho na ba rloms pas nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa tshe'i lhag ma gnas par mdzad
323a2(mdo): ba rnams dang kang dag grog 'bru bya gang dag gis / sku lus bkra' byas sprin skum 'dra gyur nas/ bkres pa bsdug bsngal snod gyurang mda' che rnod po lta bu'i spu'i sa rab kang zhing // bsgom pas byag/ 
323a3(mdo): zhu myi rtag bcas pa'i myi rnams kyis ni kun nas lus bskor ba'i// yi dgas ka nam du lta ba rnams la thugs rjes steng nas char kyi rgyun 'bebs dang // rid cen bye ma'i 'phreng ba gya krung dkrigs mtho'
323a4(mdo): rang zhu ga/ sangs gnas gang yang long nyal gyu da rgya dang nye ba cu'i zing mas pasas gyung sa/ mnama' mtsha sring bsam gtad mdzad dgu' dang / gang dag bya ban
323a5(mdo): po'i sha dang khrag gi ro brobs ka/ dka' bar gyurd pa'i ha'i tshogs kyis gang bar gyurd pa'i// sa phyogs 'gro 'khrod pags nas tshal thigs zag pa'i snum gyis mchod pa

323a7(mdo): yod la skad gcig tu ro langs byung nas a la la a la la zhes sgra 'byind cing / me stag dang bcas pa'i kad mad drag pos 'byung ba 'khrugs shing sdug par gyurd pa/ ce spyang myi bzad pa'i
323a8(mdo): kha nas ngu ba dang bcas pa'i me lce 'byung ba'i dur khrod chen po dag na bud byed kyi 'o lbom zhing lkoka der gyurd pa'i steng na 'dug cing dka' ba'i bya dkod kyi mtshul dang / sder mos lto phrad cing lto'i ding / 
323b1(mdo): nas srin bu'i rigs rnams gnas pa ce spyang gi stobs ki shugs kis drangs pa'i dang grol dri mi zhim pa'i dum bus 'khor ba bya kha bkres pas myig shi sha brus pa dag la gzigs shing / rtag tu gyi snyu bya bsgo
323b2(mdo): ste/ gang dag kha cig ro gi nas mal dong nas ni / khrag dngas chags dmar zhing chub pa'i snga 'khyil dang // bya'i mchu' dang sder mos myig rgo brus pa yang // mya ro bor po la lus la gzigs par gyu rad pa dang / sgo
323b3(mdo): srang bar la lar me 'bar me lce'i rtse mo mang pos 'go' rmongs shing // ral gyi gtun dang do bas snyun cing brdungs nas skye bo'i ku co 'dod gyurd la// gshin rje'i pho nya snying rtse myed pa sdod cig zer ba'i bzod rlag
323b4(mdo): sgras gang ba'i// sos can dmyal ba rnams su 'ang srog chags dedon phyir kar dag skad cig 'jug pa dang // gzhan yang sha ri'i bu mye'i dug mda' glang po che 'khrugs pa'i mdun logs na yal
323b5(mdo): gakhregs pa'i sdong bu yod pa/ phyogs kyi bar nas rlung chen po langs pas 'od ma'i tshal bskyod nas 'khri shid gyi dra ba dang 'dud pa las me byung ba'i me khres/ shing mchog lnga
323b6(mdo): tshogs nas ri dgas dang / phag rgod mchog mgyogs pa brgya'i dag skrag cidang 'go rmongs pa yod pa shing lo mang po lhags shing snyis mtshan/ bsil ba'i grib ma sung ser myed pa nyams
323b7(mdo): dka' laSh+Ti long myod yod pa/ nags kyi ma he dang phag rgod kyis me tog ud pa la dang / pad ya dang ka lar bskyed pas tshu dri zhim por gyur pa'i mdze'u 'gram na shing la sde'u khru gnas pa nye 'khor na
323b8(mdo): raM las chu rlabs myi drag par 'bab pas 'khor nas/ ne la sing mod pa'i sa gzhil yod pa'i 'brog dag na/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can 'chag pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang bas gtan la mchod
324a1(mdo): mngon par dka' ba/ kang dag bag myed pa'i gnas dpal bab pa yal bar mdzad pa rnams dang / ri bo rdo leb che zhing yangs la rab tu snum pa 'dra gyurd cing // klog gi 'phreng bar myi rtogs
324a2(mdo): yod la 'ja yis bkra' ba'i bdag nyid cad/ chus bsil sprin chags rnams la chu 'bab zer phrin chags pa'i rdzi ldan spyan// ser pur nam bza' g.yo' pa gang dag nyi ma'i gung la bzhugs pa dang // de bzhin
324a3(mdo): du rtag tu gos pa'i lam nas 'dong ba'i glang po'i khru'i myig rjes yod la/ nags kyi ma he 'khrugs pa'i ras klog 'khar chen po bshig pa'i shol gi khung bu nas// sbrul gyi lus phyed byung ste nags kyi rlung 'gro ba yod pa
324a4(mdo): spa tshal stug po dang 'dam bu dang shing ka shi stug po'i khrod na stag zung du gnas pa can phag rgod kyi gnas klogs pa'i glang skang gi rtsa ba 'dzangs pa lhar 'dug pa yod pa shing di tshu la me tog brul bas rdo ba rtsa dmar bar
324a5(mdo): gyur pa yod pa gagong gi phyogs su dgas kyi khru 'das rdzab la thogs pa yod pa/ shing ma ldon pa stug por skyes pa mang po yod pa'i gsher sa'i chung dgur dag tu mngod par dgyes zhing / 
324a6(mdo): dka' ba'i phyogs stond pa rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od te gis chu rtsa dmar bar gyur nga la/ thugs pasam gtan la zhend pas dpag pasam kyi shing gi smyug yas ci yor reg pa'i ri spos kyi ngang ldang
324a7(mdo): ki sul na tshol ba myed pa gang dag bzhugs pa dang gang dag seng ge sgyings pa yod pa ri dgas rgyu ba dang ldan pa/ chu 'dus te 'bab pa yod pa g.yos pas steng gi rtse mo ldeg pa'i sngags kyis skar ma'i tshogs 'phags pa
324a8(mdo): sa'i steng na lci ba lhun po yang lcug bran la bya ba bzhin du sgrim gyi dgos par zhabs kyi sor mos sa'i 'og ki ma pa dang bcas par bstsa lang par 'phen pa dag dang / ting nge 'dzind thob pa gang dag dang char pa'i chus
324b1(mdo): rdol ba'i bu ga du ma nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba lta bu yod cing rmang rdo dang rtsika ngos shag shig du gyu rad pa'i 'tshams su rgya chags la// sprul ba s+yo ba rlung gis gang ste skad der 'dug cing 'greng ba rtag tu yod cing / nags kyi nga
324b2(mdo): kyi lces tsha rko rdul can grub po ljags pas shing rtsa seng seng por gyur pa yod la tshig mang tu srid bu ko ta'i tshogs ring nas gnas par gyur cing / sre bo'i 'go stod de phyogs su lta bas byi ba skrag pa yod pas/ nang du
324b3(mdo): rtsa sngon po stug po skyes pas 'dzag ma'i khrung gi rtseg na phye ma leb rgyu pa yod cing 'ug pa mang po sgra 'byin cing klu len pa lta bu yod pa'i grong stong sus kyang ting nge 'dzi nad ma byas pa rnams na stond pa'i bka' nan tan gis
